1112.content:
Jack Mc Coy, a foriegn exchange student from America, sits in the science lab with Rei. She was assigned to be his partner but half the stuff Jack was saying went way over her head. Jack had green eyes and long blonde hair. If his ears were pointy, his friends from America would joke, he would look like Link. (Message to morons: Link is the main character in Legend of Zelda) Jack continued to mix chemicals while Rei sat back and watched.
"Rei, if this syrum works do you know the possibilities it has?" Jack asked as he tossed her a pair of goggles.
"I know that it'll get us an A in science." she said sarcasticly as she caught the goggles. "What are these for?"
"Mild chance of either explosion or intensely bright light. Better safe than sorry. After all, I wouldn't want to have to pay any nasty bills for laser eye surgery and I'm sure you wouldn't either." Jack never was one for schmoozing or blathering on and on. He was always straight to the point and spoke what was on his mind, whether it was a good idea or not.
Rei put on the goggles as Jack lowered the test tube with the strange syrum in it towards an apple. The syrum actually kind of looked like Hersheys Syrup. The only difference was it was more liquidy than the syrup. Just as Jack was about to pour the syrum in Serena and Amy burst into the lab. Actually, Serena tripped and fell through the door then Amy ran in to help her. This distraction gave both Jack, and Rei a heart attack. A drop of the syrum hit the apple Jack was about to pour it onto. Nothing happened.
"Serena, are you ok?" asked Amy helping Serena stand up.
"Watch where you're going meatball head! You could've hit me!" retorted Rei. Serena stood up and then Rei and Serena began arguing. Amy sighed. Jack continued to seem oblivious to all that was going on in the room.
"That's strange... why didn't it work?" finally the noise seemed to attract Jack's attention. He looked to see Serena and Rei arguing and shouting at eachother. Finally he had had enough and marched over to them.
"OK," he said. "Stop fighting in here. This is a lab, if you want some place to fight you could either go to the gym peacfully and then fight. Or, you could answer to me." Jack was a good 6'2" and never had a problem intimidating people. Serena and Rei both shut up. Rei looked to Jack.
"So what is the syrum supposed to do again?"
"It's supposed to increase the mass and size of any object." replied Jack still looking at the apple, which was still unchanged in any way.
"... that's impossible! You can't make things grow." said Rei. Amy then walked up to Jack.
"You increase the amount of empty space in an object right?" asked Amy even though she already knew that was the answer.
"Precicely Amy. I've said it before and I'll say it again, you're defanitely the smart one." said Jack with a smile.
Serena and Rei were as confused as two people could be. Finally Amy tried to explain but she just made things worse and confused them even more. So then Jack said:
"Ok, physics for dummies. Basically, your body is made up of thousands and thousands of molecules and atoms. With me so far?" this was basic junior high stuff so of course they were following. They nodded.
"Good. Now an atom is made up of three basic parts. The nucleas, which is pretty much the brain, the electron and the neuron. Now between these 3 is empty space. Still following?" Amy couldn't help but giggle a bit as Jack insulted their intelligence yet still stuck to the point. He was quite good at doing that. Serena and Rei knew all this already and couldn't help but get a little angry at Jack's insulting. They nodded anyway.
"Very good! Ok, the amount of empty space in an atom is greater then we initially thought it would be. Thanks to new high powered electron microscopes we can see the atom very close up. "Someting like that," replied Amy. Waving her hands into the air, Mercury summoned a group of bubbles to create a fog around the area (her Shabon Spray for all of you picky otaku in the audience). In practically no time at all, Jack had set his taser with enough force to knock out an elephant.
Serena, meanwhile, was blind as a bat in the fog, and gradually shrinking due to the effects of Jack's antidote. Unfortunately, she was still 40 feet tall, more than large enough to grind Jack, Amy, and Rei into neat smears on the ground. In her attempts to find the three, she began randomly stomping and swinging in front of her.
"I see her! screamed Jack. Lunging towards an exposed hand, Jack plunged the taser into it, releasing 50,000 volts of electricty into her. The reaction from Serean was lunging back, screaming in agony.
"Jack!" screamed Rei. "You did it!"
"I'm not so sure..."
1112221111211122122111121222121.title: 50,000 volts of PAIN!

11122211112111221221111212221211.content:
"She's out cold." Amy said as she rushed up.

"We did it!" shouted Rei and Jack in unison. They both hugged with their eyes closed. Then they slowly opened their eyes and realized what they just did. Rei looked at Jack all fast and suprised and Jack did the same thing, then they seemed to just appear standing next to eachother with no movement of getting out of the hug position. Amy couldn't help but laugh.

A thought came to Rei and Amy's mind, Jack still hadn't shared any light onto his past. It was time to come clean but... should they ask him right now or wait until the crisis at hand is completely over, in other words, when Serena's normal again?

(If you choose "ask him now" then only have them asking Jack and Jack getting ready to answer, I will divulge Jack's past myself since he is my creation.)
11122211112111221221111212221211.title: She's down for the count.

choices: "Well, let me see where to begin..."
111222111121112212211112122212111.content:
"Okay, Jack. It's time to come clean." Rei spoke with a force both stern and respectful. After all, if she was willing to reveal that her and Amy were Sailor Scouts, that Jack should at least be willing to reveal his past. It didn't matter to her that Serena was unconsious in back of them. The antidote would return her to normal in due time.
Jack simply looked at Rei, and sighed.
111222111121112212211112122212111.title: The question.

choices: Serena was awake, heard the whole thing & starts crying
Rei or Amy say something to break the long silence
1112221111211122122111121222121111.content:
"I was the result of a drunken night in the back of a pick up truck. My father is unknown, my mom was too drunk and high to remember who he was. My mom never wanted me but, thanks to a defective condem, I was born. She hated me. She would always hit me and yell at me and blame me for her problems. I still loved her though, she was my mom after all.

When I was 7 she gave birth to my two younger brothers, Todd and Louis. She would have hit them like she did me, but I wouldn't let her. I took all the beatings. My mother wasn't a good person. She was an alcoholic and she put at least three illegal drugs into her system a day.

I grew up in the Victoria courts. It was the worst neighborhood in all of San Antonio. While there I learned, from an old guy who lived in the dumpster behind the alley we lived in, how to fight. He tought me how to move swift as the wind, strike like a raging fire with all the force of a great typhoon, to be accurate as a lightning bolt with my attacks.

My brothers weren't fighters, I wanted them to live the best life they could though so I became sort of their personal body guard. I wanted to make sure that they didn't have to go through the hell of a childhood I went through.

I spent most of my free time playing paintball with the other kids. I learned to shoot while playing paintball.

Then I got a job as a cop, I lied about my age so that I could get the job. That was the first time I held a real gun. It became my best friend and outlaws worst enemies. My life was getting better, but my mom was becomming an even nastier piece of work by the day.

She hated me and my brothers. But she only ever hit me. I wouldn't let her hit my brothers. She started getting more violent with me though. She gave me a lot of scars. Most of them are still there... forever on my back they'll remain as a reminder.

One day mom got more drunk than ever. She tried to strangle Todd... I punched her. I actually punched her!! I was shocked that I hit her and she was too. What really scared me was that, when I hit her, it felt good. She grabbed me by the throat and slammed my face into the pavement. She threw me through the window to a Texas Land and Cattle Steak House. I landed on my back on top of the grill. The burns I recieved were life threatening... if the manager hadn't called the hospital, I'd be dead.

3 months later I got out of the critical condition ward. I went to the police station and grabbed my Springfield 03' rifle. The police force had tracked down my mom's supplier, we were to go there and set up positions. Kill him if he tried to run.

I was going to kill the son of a bitch that kept supplying my mom with those god damned pills. I knew that my mom was gonna be in the Menger Hotel meeting with Enrique. I set up position in the Crocket Hotel. I looked through the scope and saw my mom buying her pills from Enrique.

I've seen alot of dirtbags before, but somehow, this was different. I knew Enrique was supplying my mom since before I was born, but I never said a word because my mom needed her pills. This was different, THIS was personal. I didn't just want to arrest this scum ball so he could walk free on the streets the very same day, I wanted to send this bastard to hell where he belonged.

2 officers were set up on the other side so that we formed a triangle. Enrique was at the point of the triangle, I was the at the bottom left point and Officer Zepata and Nickson were on the bottom right.

Our seargent moved in to get Enrique, he ran for it and my mom did too. He gave the orders, shoot to kill, I repeat shoot to kill. I found that bastard in my scope and I fired away!! I shot every ounce of hate I had for that man out in 12 rounds of 8 hot lead bullets. I got him... I got him. But it cost me... and it cost my mom even more. I hit her in the back of the head with 3 of the shots.

Everyone praised me and said great shooting... but I killed my own mother! What had I done... god what had I done?!! With her gone my brothers and I went to an orphanage.

I managed to get the blueprints of the place from an old friend from thee force. My brothers and I formed an escape plan from the orphanage. Louis, Todd, 3 of their friends who wanted to leave the orphanage, and myself snuck out of the orphanage via the heating ducts and ventilation system. We used the plumbing system for a little bit since the toilets didn't flush at all, they were just for show. We managed to escape the orphanage.

I went back to my old job at the police academy. I saved up some money and managed to rent a ratty crap ass appartment for us to live in. The police station got bombed in a terrorist attack though. With our source of income gone, I had to find another way to get the money.

I saw an add in the paper about a foriegn exchange student program. Each week you participate in the program you recieve 500 smackers in cash. I took the opportunity so I could support my brothers. When I get the checks I send them to my brothers in the mail.

That's why I'm here...." After Jack tells his story there is nothing left but a loooong silence.
1112221111211122122111121222121111.title: Jack's Past Revealed for the First Time

choices: The three forget all about Serena and leave
Serena's still unconsious, fools!  Help her out!
11122211112111221221111212221211112.content:
The tension on the field by the school could be cut with a knife. After Jack finished his story, the room remained quiet for several minutes. Finally, Rei began to speak.
"That's, horrible."
"I can't believe your own mother would do that," added Amy.
"That's why I worked on the growth formula. I figured something like that could revolutionize the world. And give my family the money we needed to live. I never expected any human to drink it, and I definetely didn't expect it to drive people insane." The last sentence was accompanied with a sense of regret and sadness.
"Aw, cheer up Jack," added Rei. "You can still work on it. We made an antidote together, didn't we?"
Jack was suprised by the unrelenting optimism of the girls in front of him. "You'd be willing to help me? Even if I know who you two really are?
"Sure!" answered a cheery Amy. "After all you've gone through, and helped us out, it wouldn't be a problem at all!"
With a life as tragic as Jack's, he was used to rejection and the like, so the fact that these two girls were willing to reveal their deepest secret, and then help him still, was something of a small miracle to him. Tears came to his eyes.
"Jack," asked Rei, "are you crying?"
"I didn't expect the two of you to be so nice, that's all."
"Hey, don't worry about it. We're friends. We're supposed to help each other out." Amy nodded in agreement.
11122211112111221221111212221211112.title: Rising from the ashes of memories...

111222111121112212211112122212111122.content:
Jack looked at the unconcious Serena. Even though she tried to kill him, and she wasn't the first. Jack left out some parts that were too hard for him to have to think of. Things that he didn't want anyone, even his brothers, to know.

"Well... it'd be mean to leave meatball head here." said Jack as he walked over to the now 20 foot giantess. "Especially since she's still half naked. Rei, Amy, you grab her legs. I'll get her shoulders."

"Where are we taking her?" asked Amy as they began hauling her off like a beached whale.

"To my place.... no wait... how bout one of your places?" asked Jack.

"Our parents would kill us." they both said in unison. Jack sighed.

"To my place it is then."
111222111121112212211112122212111122.title: Onward to Jack's house.

choices: Get Serena the hell away from this place
Let her wake up next to a dead guy.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221.content:
Jack led the girls to an old run down neighborhood. Serena had regressed back to her normal size now but she still remained unconcious. Jack unlocked the door to a trailor and stepped inside.

"Welcome to my house." he said nonchalantly. Amy and Rei looked around.

"Is that.... a chalk outline on the floor?" asked Rei as she pointed to the chalk outline on the floor.

"Yeah... he isn't the only one who died in here though. I hope Serena won't mind that she'll wake up in the bed my buddy from the police academy died in." said Jack as he began walking towards the door to a bedroom.

"When did he die?" asked Rei. Jack opened the door revealing a dead person lying on the bed.

"Sometime between the Today Show and the Tonight Show." said Jack with a sigh. "He was a good man..."

Amy and Rei look at each other somewhat sickened by the sight. Can they really let Serena stay in a place like this?!
1112221111211122122111121222121111221.title: What a crappy place...

11122211112111221221111212221211112212.content:
"Uh, Rei?"
"What is it Amy?"
"I don't think letting Serena wake up here is such a good idea!"
"It'll teach her a lesson for, well, trying to kill us," responded Rei with a slightly evil grin on her face.
After a short while, Serena finally began to come to. She was still 7 feet tall, though quickly shrinking back to her normal size.
"Uh, what happened? I had this weird dream that I grew real big and tried to kill Rei and Jack."
"Well, Serena," began Jack, "it's a long story." It was clear now that the antidote had reverted Serena's mind back to normal, and would very soon do the same to her body. Even between the time she woke up, she had already lost half a foot in height. But the relief quickly faded when Serena looked at the dead body next to her.
The scream could be heard three blocks away. Eventually, Rei had to cover her mouth, which now convientely had completely returned to normal, along with Serena.
"Be quiet, meatball head! Don't you know how loud you are?"
"Where, where am I?"
11122211112111221221111212221211112212.title: Back to normal

111222111121112212211112122212111122121.content:
"You're in my trailor." said Jack angrily at Serena. "Is there a problem with that?" he asked as he cracked his knuckles.

"NO! No, not at all!" said Serena quickly. After a lengthy explination of what had happened, and an even lengthier period of trying to get Serena to stop crying and blubbering like a whale, they got her dressed in one of Jack's old shirts and then went off to the school where Amy and Rei, mostly Amy, promised to help Jack fix his serum.

"Well, we have a theoretical inprovement here... but we need a Test Subject to make sure it'll work on living things like Turkey, and Chicken and Cows so we can have more meat at a cheaper price." Jack began as he held up the new serum. Serena volunteered but everyone quickly shouted at her and she sat back down.

Who gets to test it?
111222111121112212211112122212111122121.title: A new formula

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Since I helped to design it," began Amy, "it would seem that I should be the one to test it."
"Sounds fair to me," responded Jack. "Rei, do you have a problem with that?"
"Nope. Not at all. Just keep it away from Meatball head."
"Hey!" shouted an angry Serena. "How was I supposed to know the old formula drove people insane?"
Once again, Amy had found herself breaking up an argument between Serena and Rei while Jack looked on.
"Calm down you two!" Turning to Jack, she took a small amount of the new serum and began to drink it.
"Now remember, only drink a little. I need to test this stuff in stages."
Nodding in agreement, Amy swallowed about an ounce of the serum, and waited for the formula to take effect.
"Booring!"
"Not now Serena! This is important!"
"Will you pipe down!" screamed Jack to Rei and Serena. "This is the good part."
Sure enough, Amy began to feel incredibly warm throughout her entire body, and soon enough, she began to grow. The only question now was how big she was going to get.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Amy the giantess guinea pig

choices: Amy smacks Jack for being a perv?
She's too worried about hurting him to smack him
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Amy stopped growing at around 10 feet, since she and Rei still hadn't untransformed the uniform grew with her. Amy looked herself over not seeming to believe how small everything seemed. Then, Jack let out the classic pretty girl whistle.

"Very nice." he said as he looked up. Since Amy had gotten a so tall, Jack could see right up her mini skirt. Rei raised a hand to smack him upside the head, but remembering last time, she decided not too.

Amy blushed as she did her best to push her skirt down enough to try and cover herself. Serena had little beedy eyes as she got nervous.

"Was I that intimidating when I was giant?" asked Serena as she backed up a little nervously.

"You were about 5 times her height, and 20 times scarier. That zit on your nose was huge." said Jack without taking his eyes away from Amy.

"THERE'S A ZIT ON MY NOZE?!!" Serena panicked. Rei grabbed Serena and assured her that Jack was just being Jack and joking around.

"Now," Jack began as he pulled out a tape measure. "To make sure everything's proportionate. I'll need ot take some measurments." Said Jack with a smile.

Rei and Serena looked at him, both thinking: 'Typical guy...'

What happens now?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Embarassing situation

choices: They give Amy some more of the serum
They decide to test it out on Rei
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Amy thought about hitting Jack for being a pervert, but quickly realized at her size she could seriously harm him. So instead, she picked him up with a stern look on her face.
"You need to learn some manners, Jack!"
"Sorry," responded an embarassed Jack.
Putting Jack down carefully, she began to walk around, testing her ability to move. Although she was annoyed with Jack looking up her skirt, she was also a bit embarassed as well, not being used to so much attention.
"So," asked Jack, "how do you feel?"
"Just fine, actually. And I'm sure I look fine too," she added with a slight giggle. Jack blushed at the remark.
"So," asked Rei, "you don't feel like causing mass destruction or crushing anyone?"
"Of course not! I don't want to hurt you guys!"
Jack was relieved by this. "Well, she's sane. And one ounce of the serum caused a growth from the original height to 10 feet! Very impressive!"
"Thanks, I guess."
"Hey, if it wasn't for you, I'd still be working on the compounds."
Blushing, Amy turned around and looked at Rei and Serena, who gave her a thumbs-up sign.
"For the next test, I guess we could give you some more of the serum Amy, or we could test it on Rei."
Rei was confused. "Why on me?"
"I can't be sure if it works the same on everyone untill two people try it."
"Why can't I try it?" asked Serena. The resulting glares from everyone, inlcuding the 10 foot tall Amy, made her sit down and keep quiet.

"You're a dead man Jack!!" said Rei as she leapt for him.

Rei...

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
The sense of anger had turned to absolute dread when it hit on Rei exactly what she did.
"Crap! This is what I get for making you an amazon!"
Rei was quick to apoligize. "Oh, Jack! I didn't know!"
"Hell, it's happened before. Cops need to make this judgement call a lot." Although he managed a smile, Jack was still in a lot of pain.

"Hey, you guys are superheroes, right? Can't you just heal me?"

"Serena!" angrily shouted Rei. "This is serious!"
"I've had worse," responded Jack. "I'm not a baby. If you're going to take me to the hospital, take the antidote, and drop me off. I'm a quick healer though. I'll be back on my feet in a week."

"No, really, I'll be fine. Look, it's your call. My fault anyway. Shouldn't have pulled a paintball gun."

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Why don't you want to go to the hospital Jack?" asked Amy concerned as she began to walk closer.

"One, I don't need no doctor to tell me what to do. I can handle myself..." Jack realized how that sounded. "let me refrase that, I can take care of myself. Two, I can't afford a doctor, a room in a hospital, or ANY of the medications or procedures they'll do on me to heal me. And 3, They'll want to know how I broke my ribs and why they're broken in the shape of a fist." said Jack counting off the reasons on his fingers. Amy and Rei looked at each other and had to agree that, he was right.

"Ok, we won't take him to a hospital. Amy, you patch him up you're the one who knows what to do. Jack, take off your shirt so Amy can see if anything's serious." said Rei.

"Uhm... I don't really think that's nessecary. I know the wounds and... it's uh.. it's... it's nothing. Nothing... it's... nothing, nothing at all." Jack stammered.

"Jack," began Amy as she sat in front of Jack. "I need to examine the injury to determine how serious it is. Please, take off your shirt." She said both forcefully and gently. Jack was surrounded by all three girls. The two Amazons to his front left and right, and the meatball head behind him.

"I really don't think this is nessecary girls." said Jack trying to avoid taking his shirt off in front of them.

"Jack," said Rei getting fed up with his whining. "If YOU don't want to take your shirt off I'll do it for you. So what's it gonna be?"

Jack sighed and took off his shirt. On his back, the burn you'd expect to see after the life threatening ordeal from his childhood. It was shaped like a bar. It wasn't deformed or anything, the skin was normal but it was darker than the rest of his skin. On the rest of his body, including his back, were several other scars. Some looked like they were from bullets, others from knives, some from bite marks.

Amy acted very proffesional, despite the several questions she had for Jack about how he recieved some of the more grotesque slash and bullet scars, and only payed attention to his ribs. Remarkabley, only 3 ribs were broken. There were 4 fractures in all but only 3 of his ribs sustained injury, his chest was bruised in the shape of Rei's fist, the fractures where her knuckles impacted. Rei and Serena were not as considerate as Amy was.

All sorts of questions flooded Jack. Rei wanted to know how much of his life he had "forgot" to tell them. Serena wanted to know if it hurt when she poked his various burns and scars. Jack's humiliation was unbearable. Amy saw this and quickly gestured for Rei and Serena to shut up.

After Jack got his shirt back on and regained some of his dignity, they wondered what to do next...

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Now that his wounds were patched up, and his dignity partially restored, Jack was ready to begin further testing of the serum. Deciding that since Amy had been the nicest of the three girls, she would be the one to test the next batch of serum. This didn't sit too well with Serena.

We need to be sure that you're proportionat to your original size after all." Rei shoved Jack knocking him to the ground. Amy, who controls her temper very well, helped Jack up with a single hand.

Rei drinks some of the serum and...

Of course, Serena didn't want to be left out of the fun. So it came as no suprise to Jack when she went over to the feet of Amy and Rei and began begging Jack for the serum.
"Please, I'll be good! I really will!"

"Oh come on! You made Rei and Amy huge! And Rei broke your ribs." That reminder made Rei shudder a little.

"Jack..." Serena began sternly. Darien was looking from the curious/angry faces of the girls to Jack. He didn't really want to say anything because, pissing Jack off could mean a bullet in his head, and, Pissing the girls off could mean he ends up a greasy smear on the floor.

"Look, if I get out of this alive, I'll tell you how I know these psychos."

The girls...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: The Shot Heard Round the World

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Rei quickly spoke up. "We just can't let you walk into the line of fire!"
"I told you before that I can take care of myself! responded Jack sternly. "These guys are my enemies, not yours."
"But we're your friends," responded Lita. "And seeing you get killed isn't something I want to see."
"Yeah, but knowing this guy, he's heavily armed."
"Look Jack," interrupted Serena. "Right now we could squash you, and those guys under our feet. Don't you think we could be useful?"
Jack looked at the girls. If he said yes, that would mean putting them right in the line of fire. If he said no, well, Jack just remembered Rei breaking his ribs and Lita scaring him half to death. He wasn't sure if saying no was a good idea. Especially considering that they seemed determined to fight.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: You don't fight alone...

choices: Jack stood victorious next to two unconcious mobsters.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
After much deliberation in his head, Jack finally decided it would be better for his health if he just let them do something. At least, put them under the delusion that they were doing something productive to help him.

"Alright alright, fine. You can help." said Jack as several bullets from a rapid fire machine gun came from a hill. Then a few more sniper shots came from the barn again.

"Rapid-Fire-Machine-Gun... Lupino. Damn... 2 big fish in one day." said Jack as he nonchollantly pulled out a pipe bomb, lit it and tossed it in the direction of Lupino.

"What do we do?" asked Rei as she tried to find the small gunners. Being so big wasn't without disadvantages, one of them is people are smaller and much easier to miss.

"I'm moving in, Amy, I'll need some cover fog. Lita, Rei, I want you two to obliterate ANYTHING that moves. Serena, Mina...." Jack looked at the two of them and finally said,"try not to do anything stupid."

Dime hopped off the barn and pulled out his Ingrams. Lupino stayed on his knees with his maching gun aimed in Jack's general direction.

"McCoy! Ve're calling you out! Show yourself, or are you chicken?!?" asked Dime as he prepared to jump out and fire.

"CHICKEN?! Nobody... calls me chicken!" Jack dashed out guns blazing as Lupino sprayed the air with bullets. Amy quickly spread a myst over the area. All that could be heard were gun shots and foot steps in the foggy myst. Then... there was nothing. When the smoke cleared...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: High stakes.

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Rushing foward, Rei and the others found Jack over the two gangsters, clutching his left shoulder.
"Jack!" screamed Amy. "What happened?"
"Too slow. Bastard Dime clipped me in the shoulder." Jack let go of his shoulder, revealing where the gunshot pierced him. Amy began to examine the wound, but Jack started to walk away.
"Hey!" angrily shouted Serena. "Where do you think you're going?"
"If Lupino showed up, that means the Finitos are here too. This is something I need to deal with myself."
"Oh no you don't!" responded Serena as she picked Jack up. "You're going to tell us everything that happened with these guys. I swear, you can be such a hardhead..."
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: A pain long forgotten.

choices: They let Jack fight his own fight.
They have to meddle because they're sailor scouts.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"I don't have time for this Serena." said Jack sternly.

"Make time then, because until we hear why they're after you, you're not going anywhere." replied Rei in an equally stern, if not more, tone.

"Fine... Jack Lupino and Boris Dime are 2 of the highest ranking mobsters in the Riojas crime family. A few years back... around the time my ma died, the leader of the Riojas family, Edward Riojas, started trafficking a new drug; Yah Bah. Also known as the Crazy Drug. Lupino was the one who took care of selling the stuff. 18 months ago, I learned that Enrique had been getting his junk from Lupino...." said Jack as he thought back to the day he went undercover in the Riojas crime family.

He didn't want to tell them everything... after all, they knew he killed one person and that was bad enough. If they found out he took out more than three fourths of the Riojas crime family... well... I doubt they'd EVER trust him.

"It's ok," said Amy as she stroked Jack with a hand. "We're your friends Jack. You can tell us." Jack nodded.

"I went undercover, DEEP undercover. It took me half a year to work my way up the ladder of small time mobsters, and gain the trust of Boris Dime, The Finito Brothers, Josh Lupino, all of the most infamous scum of San Antonio. I heard another big deal was gonna go down. I couldn't let it happen, they were running low on Yah Bah and if this ship didn't get the supply in, the Riojas's wouldn't be able to supply Enrique, or anyone else, with those pills." The girls stared at Jack waiting to hear the end of the story. They looked like children being read a bed time story.... very.... very large... sexy children.....

"Long story short, I won, they lost. I faked my death so they wouldn't be looking for me and then I came here about a month ago when I couldn't work in the force anymore." said Jack.

"Why not?" asked Lite. Jack thought quickly trying to think up a good excuse without telling them the truth. He got fired because in the process of the Narcotics Arrest, he got a bit trigger happy on all the drug dealers who inadvertendly created him, and made his life a living hell.

"Uhm... uh... Weapons discharge! Shot myself in the foot and couldn't chase noone down anymore." said Jack. What now?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Jack's connection in the Riojas crime family.

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Now, if you'll excuse me," continued Jack, "I need to find the Finito brothers." But before he could leave, Rei put her gigantic foot right in front of him.
"Not without us you won't. It's not like you can take these guys alone!"
"Actually," replied Jack smugly, "it's a lot like that." Jack attempted to walk forward again, but this time was caught by Serena's gigantic hand.
"Hey! Leggo! You just can't butt into my buisness!"
"No, you look!" responded Serena harshly. "I know you think you're doing us a favor, but it's not like you can just leave us out! We're your friends, and we want to help! Besides, what can a couple of mobsters do to us?"
"You don't know these guys."
"Why do you keep pushing us away?" shouted Rei. "Aren't we trustworthy?"
"Of course you are!" quickly responded Jack.
"Then let us help you!"
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: This is "A Sailor Moon GTS story" after al

They won't let him steal any more money from the dead.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Jack never liked to accept help from anyone. He kept rushing through thoughts in his head. Finally 5 minutes later, he spoke.

"Aww... crap!" Jack was beaten. The girls would get to help. It wasn't a good idea, but it's not like Jack had a choice. Especially since the longer he took to decide the more frequently Serena would lightly squeeze his broken rib cage.

"Ok, knowing Lupino, he was probably too doped up to remember Riojas's number. Our best bet of finding Riojas is through Lupino's cell." said Jack. Serena let Jack down and Jack searched both unconcious bleeding men with speed, accuracy and skill. He had done this before many times.

"Find anything?" asked Lita when Jack finished.

"Bingo! Riojas is good, very good. But... I'm better." said Jack with a smile as he pocketed the money. He was about to leave then he turns around. "I wonder if Dime has any cash on him?" Jack wondered aloud.

After taking some notes down on a piece of paper and a pen conviently left behind by Lupino, Jack had found the address.
"The Finito's are at a hotel in the middle of the buisness district."
"Then let's get em!" shouted Lina.
"That isn't a great idea," interrupted Amy. "I mean, with all these gangsters, attacking them head on?"

Jack...

choices: All the girls step over the line
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Not a good idea Lita. This is exactly why I wanted to work alone. The 5 of you are like giant moving targets." said Jack grimmly as he loaded all 5 of the Ingrams he had on him. He grabbed 5 grenades and put them in his pocket. He had a sawed-off shotgun, 3 Barettas, 5 Molov Cocktails, and of course, the rapid fire machine gun that Lupino was using.

"What would we be targets for?" asked Amy. Jack reached into his pocket and held up a small vile of a green glowing liquid. "This is a dangerous chemical weapon developed by Riojas himself. Valkyr V. Highly addictive, very harmful to the system. Scientists are still arguing over whether to consider it a drug or a chem. weapon. It has the destructive potential of a chemical weapons bomb, and the same mental affects as drugs like Tobacco and Marijuana. You get addicted physically and mentally. But Valkyr V... every time you get some... you lose vital tissue and organs. The chemical mixes with the blood stream... you will get addicted. And you will die a slow painful death if you come into contact with Valkyr V." said Jack. "We're not going to go barging in there shouting, 'shoot me, shoot me.' We need to be calm, cool and collected. Riojas is more dangerous than any of you are right now, even without Valkyr. Should any of you choose to leave, there will be no shame in doing so." As Jack said this, he took his shot gun and walked with it in front of him, drawing a line in the sand, immitating William Berett Travis from the Battle of the Alamo. "Those who choose to stay and fight the Riojas crime family, step over the line I just drew. If you don't want to face them, stay where you are."

"I don't know who this man is, but anyone who would use a weapon like that deserves to be punished."
Lita, Mina, and Rei quickly followed suit. As heroes, they explained, they couldn't let someone like that run around in their city, even if they were 2 inches tall.

There would only be about 3 guards inside the building and 8 guards outside. The ones outside would be for the girls. The ones inside though, Darien could handle them.

Looking around the room, at all the dead bodies, at his own blood stained hands, at his gun, Jack smilied. It was poetic justice, in a sort of melodramatic way. So he did something he hadn't done too much during his life. He smiled.

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Jack realized something. For the first time in his life, he realized his life had a purpose. Rei mattered to him, and if she was willing to keep him alive for whatever reason, then somebody needed him. Jack never was one to cry. In fact, I doubt if he's ever shed a tear even from pain. For the first time since Jack can remember... he let out tears. Not of sadness, but tears of joy.

Rei hugged Jack against her cheek and Jack did the best he could to hug her back. If this was live tv you could hear the audience going, "Awwwww".

Then Jack opened his mouth to say...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: It's a wonderful life after all...

choices: The girls leave in search of some guys
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Let's get out of here Rei."
Rei looked at Jack half expecting a long speech of some sort, but he simply sighed.
"I told you before, I wasn't good at speeches. Now let's go."
Rei put Jack on her shoulder as she walked off with the other girls. The past two days had been a whirlwind of bizzare mishaps and painful memories, but now he felt free. He had something to live for, namely the 115 foot tall Sailor senshi who was in love with him. And that was reason enough for him to keep on living. With the new feeling in him, he walked up to Rei's cheek and kissed her.
"I can't say how much I love you, Rei." Looking at her tiny boyfriend, Rei smilied and picked him up again, placing him between her breasts.
"You don't have to. I love you too. Now relax, close to my heart." Jack obliged, sleeping soundly for the first time in a long time.

During all of this, Amy, Lita, and Mina watched as Rei and Serena played with their tiny boyfriends, and smiled.
"I love a happy ending," chirped Amy.
"Sure, happy for them," responded Lita. "But what about us? We're alone."
"We have each other," joked Mina.
"No, seriously," responded Lita. "We're still huge. Let's leave Rei and Serena alone and go out for a night on the town!"
"I don't know," responded Amy.
"Oh, come on! It'll be fun! And we'll be careful. Besides, what else are we gonna do?"
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Cue cheesy romantic music

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Amy finally caved and 3 of the 5 giant senshi left for the city. Mina and Lita wanted to search for boys. Amy went along to make sure neither of them caused mass panic or anything like that.

"Bet I'll find a cute boy before you do Lita." said Mina.

"No way." Lita retorted.

"$20 says I do."

"You're on." said Lita. The two shook on it and the hunt began. Who finds a cute guy first?

The two girls quickly split up to look for a cute guy, while Amy 1.- referreed and 2.- Made sure there wasn't any mass panic in the streets.
Mina decided to look around downtown, thinking it'd be easy to find someone with all the clubs in the area. Sure enough, her theory was rewarded with a huge line of guys waiting outside a packed club. Mina had her pick of the crowd, which thanks to the blaring music playing, was oblivious to her presence.
"Hmm, which one to choose, which one." Reaching down into the crowd, she found exactly the boy that would win her the bet.

Mina heard a noise. Someone was coming. Either Lita had found a boy too or Amy heard the panicking. Mina turned and saw...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Panicky peoples

"Well, I went into the area to find..." began Mina.

"Well, no," replied Mina, realizing the stupidity of her mistake.
Amy sighed, then put her arm around her moping friend. "I think the problem is your technique."
"Technique?"
"Well, sure! You just can't go in and act like a monster reaching into a crowd! You need to act more natural."
"Natural?"
"Less like a monster wanting to eat people and more like a girl wanting to go out."
Mina smirked. She didn't know Amy had it in her! Guess all that time she spent with Jack must have started to mess with her brain.
Attempting to be more careful, the girls approached another club where people were congregating, including some from the club where Mina first appeared. This time however, she
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: What are you doing?!

After following Amy's advice, Mina recieved a willing guy to go with her. There were several and to her, they were all adorable. So she chose some dumb thing and decided that's what she'd look for. This lucky bastard was the only one in the crowd with blonde hair so he won. If Mina gets back to normal size, (which probably won't happen anytime soon.) those two could make the worlds dumbest babies.

Mina was now getting to know her tiny teen. So, Amy set out to go find Lita and make sure she didn't get frustrated and go Godzilla on the town. Mina had found a girl, Amy was busy reffing and Lita on the other hand...

choices: Amy explains everything to the teen
She decided to keep him for herself
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
While Mina was getting to know her new blond boy-toy better, Amy decided to look around for Mina, impressed by her own advice.
"I'm suprised that worked out. Maybe I should try it out myself later."
Amy's daydreaming was quickly interrupted by a loud pitched yell. Having a sneaking suspicsion who was behind it, she ran off to where the noise was. Predictably, Lita was in the same area.
"Somebody help me!"
Amy ran toward the sound of the voice, a terrified black haired man huddled over in Lita's palm.
"Lita!" scolded Amy in her ususal 'what are you doing?' tone. "Who is that?"
"Oh, him?" answered a surprised Lita. "Someone I found. Isn't he cute?"
Amy bent over to look at the terrified teenager. He had a slightly dark complexion, but it was difficult to see his face considering he was hunched over in terror.
"You know, Lita, you just can't bend over and pick up whoever you see without an explanation! You're trying to find a guy, not scare him to death!"
"Yeah, but I didn't want him to get away."
Amy hit herself when she heard that. Nevertheless, her first priority was to make sure the tiny boy stopped shivering in terror.
"Don't worry," she whispered. "I'm not going to hurt you." In response, the horrified boy looked up at Amy, who had her hand extended. He quickly ran over to her.
"Keep me away from her! That monster grabbed me out of the sidewalk!"
Amy looked at the guy as he clung to Amy's hand. She didn't want him to think Lita was a monster. But on the other hand, he was kinda cute...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: The horrified teen

choices: To find a boy for Amy
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
After a very lengthy explination later, the dark haired guy was a little more calm. He wasn't all that thrilled about being in the complete control of some chick but, not like he has much of a choice. Besides, it does have it's advantages.

"See," said Amy in a tone that made her sound somewhat like a mother. "you don't need to use your size to your advantage to get a cute guy."

"Thanks Amy." said Lita with a smile as she hugged her new boy into her chest. Mina gave her new boy a big kiss. Amy was still alone though. She could go find a boy for herself. Or, she could check to see how Rei and Serena are doing and maybe get close to Jack. It's easier to get close to someone you know after all than it is to get close to a total stranger... well... when you're the shy type at least. Where do the girls go?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Another lengthy explination.

choices: Amy's a BIG girl, she can handle herself
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Amy, being the kind girl she was, didn't like the idea of taking a guy away from her friends, no matter how good he felt. Jack seemed to have a genuine affection for Rei, and as much as she hated to admit it, it was something she had to respect. But she still had reservations about looking for a guy of her own, untill the other girls started to tease her.
"What's wrong?" asked Lita. "Afraid to follow your own advice?"
"Yeah, I mean, it worked wonders for me!" shouted Mina, holding a her new boy toy in front of Amy as proof.
Rolling her eyes, Amy started to look around the city in search of a boy. Taking a cue from Mina, she started to look around nearby clubs for guys. And like before, she managed to find a crowd of guys set up outside a club. So many choices, so little time.
"Excuse me," she asked meekly to the crowd hoping to get some attention. "I was wondering..."
Predicably, the crowd turned around and started looking at the shy giantess. The expressions ranged from the usual awe to a group that was staring at her gigantic panties. Luckily for them, Amy couldn't see what they were staring at.

From the sides, Mina and Lita both stared at Amy.
"Do you think she needs our help?" asked Lita.
"I don't know," responded Mina. "I mean, she did help us..."
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Amy's search

choices: She gets to know her new boy-toy first
She goes to hang with the others first

Amy was crashing and burning out there. The girls were going to step in to help but, Amy suddenly got a second wave of confidence.

"Would one of you like to go out for some fun with me?" she said as sexily as she could. Naturally the whole crowd was hooting and hollaring responses of joy and acceptance. After about 15 minutes Amy randomly selected a lucky stranger from the crowd.

He had a nice tan, his hair was dyed a dark dark red. Like Maroon kind of. And he wore it up in short spikes. He was wearing mostly black... well... all black. A black leather trench coat, black shirt, black pants, black leather boots, and black gloves.

Now that Amy had a guy no one would be alone. She was wondering how Serena and Rei were doing. But she did want to get to know the guy she picked out. Earlier when he introduced himself, he was very polite. He seems nice enough. What does she do?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Victory!

choices: Go see how Mina and Lita are doing with their little men
Head back to where Rei and Serena are
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
After looking at the tiny man in her hand for a little while, Amy allowed her curiosity to get the better of her. Raising him up to her head, she began to ask the man a few questions.
"What's your name?"
"Ben," replied the man as he lied down on Amy's palm, trying to get comftorable.
"O.K. Ben," continued Amy, "you go out a lot?"
"You mean to clubs and stuff? Yeah, when I'm bored. I mean, don't superheroes go out to clubs?"
Amy couldn't help but giggle at the superhero comment. She was always unsure what to think about being called a "hero." So being able to laugh at it was good for both of them.
The next thing she noticed was pretty obvious. Ben was covered in black from head to toe.
"You like black?"
"You like blue?" responded Ben. "I like the color. Fits my tone."
"Which is?"
Ben smirked. "I don't really know."
Amy laughed as the two continued talking. Ben was nice enough, a college sophmore who'd rather hang out with his friends than study. He seemed intellegent enough, understanding (or at least pretending to) the story about Jack and his growth serum.
After about 10 minutes, both of them felt that they had a signifigant understanding of the other. Amy was left to decide where to go next.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Interview with a giantess

choices: Watch the fight between Godzilla and the Senshi
What does Jack see while he's passed out.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Amy was about to start having some fun, when there was a deafening roar from the shore. Amy, Lita and Mina looked and saw the horrifying sight. GODZILLA!!!

Below them, many people were running around like idiots at the sight of the 300 foot monster known as Godzilla. Some were catching a glimpse of the Sailor Scouts panties as they ran for their miserable lives... I do this alot.

**************************************************

Rei and Serena were enjoying themselves with their boyfriends, when a loud roar interrupted their fun.

"Did you... her that Jack?" asked Rei. Jack climbed out of her bra, his shirt gone and his hair a wild mess.

"Huh... no-I... Uh-I, I didn't hear nothing." Jack said not wanting to have to leave. Serena then gasped as she pointed to Godzilla.

"NO! It's Godzilla!!" shouted Darien.

"Impossible." Jack stated. "International Copyright laws prevent Godzilla from appearing in not only any work of fiction by Freak Boy and/or Somedude, but in any production that isn't put out by Tokyo's movie companies. It also means Godzilla can't appear in any story about Sailor Moon."

"Well, he's here." Rei said. "This could get dangerous, Jack and Darien, you guys get out of here." Serena and Rei placed their boyfriends on the ground as Godzilla came closer. Jack punched the window of a parked car and climbed in. Darien got in the back after Jack unlocked the car and hotwired it. They drove off as fast as they could.

Godzilla marched forward trashing Tokyo as he aproached the Sailor Scouts. He hit a building with his tail causing it to collapse and land on Jack's newly aquired car. Jack passed out, Darien was left to try and wake him up.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Godzilla!

choices: to take the Dark Moon's offer.
to remain loyal to Rei and keep the gifts.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Where am I?" Jack asked as he looked around at the dark shadowy world known as, The Negaverse.

"That, is not important. Most people who arive here do not live. I will spare you though, for reasons that will become clear momentarily." said an evil femanint voice from the shadows.

"Who are you?!"

"Someone who will make you rich and powerful. Jack, I know of your serum of growth. I would like for you to give it to me."

"Hmm... y'see, that aint gonna work. I already have these plans, you know, perfect it, put it out on the market, get rich, retire on an island paradise in Hawaii with my girlfriend. That sort of thing."

"You're not thinking BIG, Jack. Most unlike you."

"What do you mean?"

"Let me put it this way, if you put the Serum on the market, you'll be rich enough to rule over a small island like Hawaii or Japan. BUT, if you give it to me... I will make you rich beyond your wildest dreams. You will have money, power... and all the beautiful women you desire. You will rule the world as my King."

"Hmmm... so far I don't see a downside, except that... oh I don't know- REI WOULD KILL ME!"

"Fine then, I'll just have to speak your language." Suddenly Queen Berrol revealed herself as she walked forward. She held out a hand and dropped a diamond the size of a baseball in Jack's hand. His eyes widned as he looked at the gem with a big smile.

"Keep talking..." he said. She smiled and opened her hand again dropping 3 small bags in his hand. One full of Rubies, one full of Emeralds and the other of gold coins. Jack put them in his pocket.

"I'll give you some time to think."

**************************************************

Suddenly, Jack woke up. The first thing he did was check his pocket, he found the bags and the diamond.

"So... it wasn't a dream."

"What are you talking about, Jack? We have to get out of here. The fight is moving this way." Darien said.

"Right, let's move." said Amy's boyfriend as he helped Jack up.

Jack didn't ask questions, he just ran with the others, facing the big moral dilemna. World Power and Money, or a normal life with Rei on Hawaii.

It took him mere seconds to decide...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: The Dark Moon's Offer

choices: Darien starts to wonder about Jack
Forget Jack, how are the senshi doing against Godzilla?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
It took Jack about 10 seconds to decide. He wanted power. He made the serum for profit, and this tender offer was more than any man could possibly want.
"Do I want ulimited power?" thought Jack to himself. "Hell yeah. Now if I only knew where to send the formula."
A voice seemingly out of nowhere responded. "Here will be just fine."
Jack turned around to see he wasn't running with the other guys, but rather in the same void as before. Turning around, he saw the same woman from before.
"Well, I don't have a sample on me," began Jack, "just the formula on paper."
The woman chuckled for a bit as she approaced him. "The formula is all that I shall require."
Jack sighed and handed her the paper. She smiled.
"You understand the agreements of what just happened. Payment for your services, which is complete rule over the Negaverse, shall be completed as soon as I and my followers destroy Japan. In advance, this should be enough to keep you fed for quite a while." She laughed, handing Jack a small bag. When he looked inside, he found it was filled with sparking diamonds."
The woman smiled sinisterly as she extended her hand. "Agreed?"
Jack grinned as he extended his hand in return. "Agreed."

*************************************************

"Jack, Jack? Oh, God, not again."
Jack came too, realizing he was on the floor, and Darien was above him. "What happened?"
"You got hit in the head with some debries. Come on, let's go."
Jack quickly got to his feet as he ran. He didn't know exactly what the woman meant about "The destruction of Japan." Considering how rich and powerful he was about to become, he didn't care either.

"Okay, I'm out of ideas."
Rei stepped up in front of the lizard as Lita backed off. "We can't beat this guy alone. We'll have to attack at once."
The other girls nodded as they readied their attacks. Before Godzilla knew what was happening, he got hit from all sides by the senshi's combined powers. In typical fashion, a huge cloud of smoke appeared.
"Did we get him?" asked Serena. Convientely, the smoke cleared, and...

THE LEGENDARY SEA MONSTER OF JAPANESE FOLKLORE, GOOOODZILLAAAAAA!!"

The girls couldn't help but stare at the crowds that gathered to watch the fight between them and Godzilla, especially at the guy in the afro who claimed he was representing Godzilla.
"Okay, what are these guys doing again?" asked Serena. Her curiosity was quickly satisfied when she saw crews of cameras all over the place, and guards everywhere.
Mina couldn't help but laugh. "They think this is a movie!"
"Well, do something!" demanded a worried Rei.
Mina sighed. "Allright!" Approaching the crowd on the sides, she began to shout at them.
"Get away from here! This isn't a sporting event! That lizard really does want to kill people!"

"HEY! Knock it off you pervs!" shouted Mina as she ran off, trying to cover her panties.
Lita sweatdropped. "They're not leaving?"
Mina shook her head. "Guess we'll just have to end this fast."
The girls turned around to see Godzilla, who was completely oblivious to the events around him. Showing his annoyance, he smashed a building with his tail.
"Hey! Godzilla just smashed a building!" shouted an onlooker.
"Stop accusing my client of these henious acts!"

Who attacks first?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: The biggest battle in Japan

Godzilla wasn't about to wait around for the senshi to strike poses and ready themselves for battle. The big lizard took a demolished building and threw it at the senshi, who had to dive out the way.
"Great!" shouted Lita. "The lizard isn't going to stay still!"
"Then I say we don't either!" responded Rei. Standing right in front of Godzilla, she used her Celestial fire attack on the lizard. Obviously realizing it, Godzilla countered with his famous atomic breath.
Rei grimaced as she put all her force into the flames, unable to hold back Godzilla's atomic breath.
"He's too strong!"
Before Godzilla could completely overwhelm Rei, Mina jumped in and attacked Godzilla with her love chain attack. The two attacks combined managed to cancel out Godzilla's radioactive breath, forcing them all back.
Rei grimaced. "So much for Plan A."
Mina just stared at the pissed off lizard, as he trashed the city while onlookers cheered. "Any ideas?"

choices: The fight with Godzilla continues in round two.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
The girls surrounded Godzilla hoping to gain an advantage by having attacks from all angles. Godzilla, who had been in this position before, turned in a 360 degree circle, knocking the girls off their feet.

"OW!" Serena said. "Jesus, I think I landed on something?" she stood up and saw that she had fallen on a brand new shiny red Ferari. "I sure hope their insurance'll cover that."

"Forget about that, look out!" Lita shouted as she jumped and shoved Serena out of the way of Godzilla's slashing claws.

**************************************************

"Forget that, we gotta get our asses down to the booky! I'm putting everything on Godzilla!"

"You're a real ass-hole... you know that, right Jack?"

"I know."

**************************************************

Godzilla charged forward, roaring loud as he could. He slashed, kicked and stomped his way to the giant sailor senshi. The whole time, they had no choice but to turn and run.

"Any-WHOAH!-bright idea's?" asked Lita as she dodged a tail swipe from Godzilla.

"I got nothing." Rei said.

"How about, try not to get killed?" suggested Mina.

"Sounds good to me. ACK! MOVE LEFT!!" Serena shouted instructing everyone to move out of the way of Godzilla's atomic breath.

"HALFTIME!" shouted the ref. Godzilla stopped in his tracks curious as to what was going on. The Sailor Senshi were led to their corner, much to their surprise.

"Godzilla, what are your predictions on the outcome of the fight?" asked a press member.

"Rawr?" Godzilla replied.

"Godzilla, are there any truth to the rumors of your involvement during World War 2?"

Godzilla's eyes simply began moving back and forth apprehensively.

"Can we just focus on the fight please?" asked Don King. "I'm so sick of hearing people talking smack about my fighters. 'Oh, he mean', 'Oh, he a dirty fighter', 'Oh, he da cause of all the destruction in Tokyo.' It's just gettin' old. Let's just let everything be decided, in the ring."

Meanwhile, the Sailor Scouts were also being interviewed by the press.

"Sailor Moon, are the rumors of your involvement in the mafia shoot out a few hours ago true?"

"Who was the strange blonde kid with Sailor Mars?"

"Is it true you slept with Jackie Chan?"

The Sailor Scouts were surprised at the idiocy of the people they were supposed to be protecting. Amy just sweat dropped while Mina tried to hold back Lita from hurting anyone. Rei and Serena got all beedy eyed at the questioners.

What happens next?
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Half Time

choices: The senshi and the nega-villians get right to the fighting

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
After an onslaught of questions from press, including one reporter who asked Sailor Moon if she had punched Jessica Simpson, the girls turned to face Godzilla again. But before the fight could continue, a bizzare portal opened in the area between the two.
"Oh, great!" shouted Lina. "What's next, King Kong?"
The portal opened, and six bizzare figures, all shrouded in darkness, exited the portal. Figures all as large as the senshi. The crowd just stared as the six figures emerged.
"Mr. King!" shouted a reporter. "Are those shadowy figures emerging from nowhere part of your entourage?"
"Of course not! I don't use shadowy figures!"
The figures finally stood in place as the smoke cleared around them. When they stood forward, everyone, especially the senshi, were stunned.
"BERYL?!" shouted an incredibly confused Serena. "You're dead!"
The red haired woman laughed at Serena. "Rumors of my demise have been greatly exaggerated. However, I have waited till I found a sufficent weapon to take my revenge on Japan. The mortal's growth formula was too good an opportunity to pass up.
Rei angrily shouted at Beryl. "Jack would never give you anything!"
Beryl smiled evily. "Mortals hearts are very, very easily corrupted. Just like your friend. How else are you going to explain six gigantic women from the Negaverse returning to destroy Tokyo?"
Rei kept quiet as Beryl turned to introduce the rest of her entourage. What did Jack do?
"Behold! My new minions!" The shadows cleared to reveal the five figures that surrounded Beryl, all as big as the senshi.
First to appear was Black Lady, a bizzare alternate version of Rini, better known to her friends as Chibi-Usa. She even had an evil version of Luna P enlarged to her current size.
Next were Avery and Prisma, two ex-members of the Black Moon family. They were followed by their superior Emerald, and finally Ann, one of the lost Doom tree children.
"Surpised, Sailor Moon?" asked Beryl laughing.
"THAT IS SICK!"
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: And now things get really bad

choices: They Kick the crap out of the Negaverse.
