Godzilla saw the forms appear seemingly out of nowhere. First, he was surprised. Then nervous as they took form. Then pissed as they made annoying noises. Finally, his instincts took over again and he roared an angry roar and charged forward to attack the Negaverse Giantesses.

"Minions, attack! Show the lizard no mercy!" shouted Queen Beryl. All of her henchwomen oblidged as they charged forward and began striking Godzilla.

"RAWR! ROOAR!" Godzilla shouted as he got the crap beaten out of him by the super powered giantesses.

"How did you even get them all here Beryl! They're all dead!!" Serena shouted.

"Cloning, the answer to all pot holes." Beryl said laughing as Godzilla went falling onto a building.

Godzilla stood up again, even after that beating. Don King took the elevator to the top of a building and walked up to the edge.

"YO! G-MAN! You ok?"

"Rawr..."

"COME ON! Don't talk like that! These bitches done nothin to earn your respec!"

"Roar, grrr rawr."

"Na, you aint washed up! Who beat Megalon?"

"Rawr..."

"That's right! And who beat Gigan AND King Ghidorah?"

"RAWR!!" Godzilla roared with much more confidence and enthusiasm.

"THAT'S RIGHT! Now go out there and kick those skinny lil' white hoe's asses!"

Godzilla charged into battle, his confidenc renewed by the motivational speaking of Don King. Meanwhile the Sailor Scouts decided to allie themselves with Godzilla to defeat the Negaverse Giantesses.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Battle with Godzilla.

choices: Beryl and co. get back up
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Do you think you can win, Sailor Moon? You and your friends are outmatched. Even with the lizards help, you can't hope to win!"
"That's what you think, Beryl!" responded Serena. "CHARGE!"
The audience cheered as the both sides charged each other. As bolts flew and the girls locked in battle, the cheers got louder.
Godzilla, not wanting to be left out of the fight, went straight for the Ann clone, who jumped out the way of the big lizard.
"You may be powerful, but you're incredibly slow!" she taunted as she landed a kick to Godzilla's head. However, the big lizard turned around and hit Ann with her claws, sending her reeling.
"That's it G-Man!" shouted King. "Kick that huge white bitch's ass!"

Mars, Mercury and Venus turned to face the three cloned members of the Black Moon family, Avery, Prisma, and Emerald. Not wasting any time, they started firing at the girls with their own distinct energy attacks.
"As if this day wasn't weird enough," panted Venus, "we have to fight long dead clones of old enemies."
Mars shrugged. "So?" Nodding to Sailor Mercury, she dodged an energy bolt to the side as Mercury created a fog around the girls.
Venus smiled. "FIRE!" The combined blasts of the three girls hit their intended targets, knocking them into a group of buildings.

Lita jumped out of the way of Dark Lady's spear gun, courtesy of the transformed Luna P. She kept laughing as Sailor Jupiter, the first one usually into a fight, was forced on a constant defensive.
"Had enough, Jupiter? You know Beryl will destroy Japan! You can't stop us!"
Jupiter smiled as she grabbed one of the dropped spears and threw it right back at Dark Lady, knocking the spear gun out of her hand.
"Hey! That isn't fair!"
"You make look like Dark Lady," responded Jupiter as she charged her thunder attack, "but you're just an impostor!"
Dark Lady had no time for a witty comeback. The thunder blast knocked her flat on her ass as people cheered.
"They like it?" asked Jupiter.
"No, they're just cheering because they can see up Dark Lady's dress," responded Mars. Indeed, the crowd was cheering as photographers started taking pictures in all the right places.

Beryl was furious. Her super team of Negaverse giantesses was getting their asses handed too them by Godzilla and the senshi. And the crowd cheered on.
"You can't win, Sailor Moon!" shouted Beryl as she blasted energy from her staff. Moon furiously jumped out of the way, but fell. The crowd roared as she fell.
"Why are you guys cheering?" asked Serena. She quickly realized the answer when the crowd gathered by her legs.
"Is there anything you idiots care about besides panties?!" Ignoring the perverts, Moon got to her feet and released her Scepter Elimination attack on Beryl. While not her strongest attack the force was enough to send Beryl flying into a skyscraper, completely smashing it.
"All right!" shouted Sailor Moon. "We did it!"
"It's never that easy," responded Sailor Mars.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Major ass kicking.

choices: The Fight of the Century Continues
Another break and press conference interupts.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Beryl let out a high pitched screetching noise. Suddenly, the ground rumbled.

"I don't like the sound of this..." Rei said getting ready for battle.

"Earthquake!" Serena shouted.

"RAWR!" shouted Godzilla.

Suddenly, out of the ground came Megalon! Flying into the area came Gigan, followed by King Ghidorah!

"Holy Shit..." Mina said wide eyed and shakily.

As King Ghidorah landed, he flapped his wings and sent the Sailor Scouts to the ground.

**************************************************

"No fucking way dude, there is no fucking way that Godzilla would team up with those bitches. Man, radio's fuckin bull shit." Said Jay as he listened to the radio reports on the incident in Japan as he drove down a road. Jay and Silent Bob were conveniently visiting Japan just in time to make a cameo appearenc in this story. Suddenly a giant Sailor Scout landed right infront of the car.

"OH, FUCK YEAH MAN!" Jay shouted. Silent Bob grabbed the wheel just barely managing to stop the car before it crashed into the panties of Sailor Mars.

**************************************************

Godzilla and the Sailor Scouts stood their ground. Then Godzilla let out a loud roar and out from the sea came, Angilas. Followed in the air by Mothra and Rodan.

Both sides stood ready to fight.

"Great special effects." said an onlooker.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Monsters and Madness

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Both sides readied themself for the next fight, but before they could, the Mexican referee called for the end of the round. Before either side knew what happened, they were flodded with questions. Queen Beryl didn't know what to make of it all.
"Excuse me, Ms. Beryl, what previous relationship do you have with Don King?"
"How much are you being paid to partake in this fight?"
"Mrs. Black Lady, you seem to bear a strong resemblance to Sailor Moon. Is there any sort of relationship between you two?"
Beryl just stared wide-eyed at the crowd. "Do you people have any idea what I could do to you?"
They all stood silent, untill another reporter spoke up.
"Is it true that you're somehow connected to the mob shootings?"
"No questions!"
Quickly obliging, the reporters split up between Black Lady, King Ghidra, and Megalon. Beryl just stared.

"No, I believe that Godzilla is more than capable of handling these new competitors by himself. He does not need the Sailors in any way, shape, or form."
"What about rumors that Beryl and her entourage are working for you?"
"Now lady, that is just ludacris. First you insult my fighter, now you insult me! No more questions. Go bug Sailor Whatever..."
"Sailor Moon!" began the reporters. "What is your relationship to Ms. Beryl?"
Serena was beyond annoyed at this point. Didn't these morons get it?
"You idiots! She wants to destroy the world! Leave!" The crowd stood still again, but then started taking pictures of the senshi with the monsters, along with the senshi's panties. They all just sweatdropped.
"Why is whenever we ask them to go away," began Lita, "do they decide to take pictures of our panties?"
"I wish I knew," responded Amy, who was doing her best to cover her skirt from the press.

After another couple of minutes of the media circus, both sides were brought back to their respective corners and prepared for the fight. Despite the stupidity of the crowd, Serena knew this was no joke.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Another timeout...

choices: manages to make Beryl and her henchwomen back to normal.
has no clue what he's doing, just like always.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Beryl charged her staff and shot an energy blast at the Scouts. They jumped out of the way just in time as Godzilla charged forward at King Ghidora. Mothra took Gigan, Rodan attacked Megalon & Angilas attacked Avery.

"Attack!" Shouted Beryl. "Attack god fucking dammit!!" The clones did her bidding and charged forward into the biggest battle of the century.

**************************************************

"Yeah, I wanna place $500 on Godzilla and the Senshi." said Jack.

"Jesus..." said Darien.

"Yes?" a voice said from behind him.

"Who the hell are you?!"

"I'm Jesus christ."

"Whoah," Jack said as he gave the booky his 500 bucks. "what are you doing down here?"

"You think I was gonna miss this? This is possibly the biggest battle of the century... at least until next year when Satan will rise up and attempt to take over the earth and then heaven."

"Has everyone gone fucking insane?!!" Darien and Jack shouted in unison.

**************************************************

Serena threw a punch at Beryl and sent her crashing into Tokyo Tower. Beryl rose up and struck Sailor Moon. Both of them began rolling around on the floor, attacking each other in a cat fight.

Silent Bob tried to hold Jay back from the scene. Jay kept trying to get closer to the action.

"Fuck you fatty! Let me fucking go! Dammit lunchbox, leave me the fuck alone! I need to get closer you dumbfuck!" Jay shouted. Silent Bob could hold on no longer and went down to the ground. Jay went charging into the scene, only to be kicked out of the area by Rei's giant foot. "Fuck man... the whole fuckin' worlds against me."

Rei continued to grow angrier and angrier at Jack for giving them the formula. "If I ever get my hands on him... I'm going to make him a greasy smear on the ground!" she shouted as she punched out Birdie.

**************************************************

Jack had been watching the fight on the news and when he saw that he got all bug eyed.

"Well... I'm gonna see you guys later."

"Where are you going, Jack? This whole mess is your fault."

"I'm heading out on the first plane back to America."

"So... you're just gonna leave? Just like that! JUST LIKE THAAT!!!"

"Uh..." Jack looked at the TV and saw Rei beating the shit out of Birdie. "Yep."

Darien could take it no more, he finally punched to hit Jack. Unfortunately, Jack knew Jujitsu so in about 5 seconds Darien was on the ground with a nose bleed.

"Thou has sinned. Jack, you have caused this mess, thou must make up for your wrong doings."

Jack sighed. "You're right Jesus... I do have to make things right again."

"That is right, my child. You must do the right thing."

"Thank you Jesus!" said Jack as he rushed off to try and make things right. Jack...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Combat and Christ

choices: It works right away this time
Like before, it takes time to work.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Jack ran as fast as he could towards the scene of the fight. He knew what he did wrong before, and now it was time to fix it. Of course, even if he did fix it, he'd still need to answer to Rei, and the police, and the bookie, and Don King...
Quickly blocking those voices from his head, Jack hurried by where the Negaverse forces were. Beryl and the others were knee deep in their battle with the sailors and Godzilla.
"Surrender Sailor Senshi!" shouted Beryl. "You know you can't win!"
The senshi were locked in a stalemate with Beryl's forces. The monsters were deadlocked, Rei was infuriated with Jack, and neither side was ready to give up. This made Jack drving up to Beryl in a hijacked car all the more surprising to both sides.
"Jack?!" shouted Rei. "What the hell are you doing?"
Beryl was furious. "Mortal, wait untill I have destroyed the senshi before I fufill your deal!"
Jack just smiled as he raised a super soaker at Beryl and the Nega-clones. "The deal's off, bitch."
Before anyone knew what was happening, the Negaverse giantesses were sprayed with the fluid from Jack's water gun. They were all completely soaked in it.
"What did you do?!" asked Beryl angrily.
"Antidote," smugly responded Jack. "You'll shrink back to normal very soon..."
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Atonement

choices: to save Jack's life so that they can deal with him.
anything Beryl'll do to him is worse than what they'll do.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
The Negaverse's forces stood still, also remaining as giantesses. They glared angrily at Jack in his hijacked car.

"Oh shit... forgot about that. It takes a while to work." said Jack as he sweatdropped. "Jesus, please help me." said Jack. Suddenly, the voice of Jesus sounded in his head.

*Sorry, my child, you're on your own.*

"GOD DAMMIT!!"

*I heard that.*

Beryl raised a foot to smash the car Jack was in. Jack jumped out of the car in the nick of time, as the car was smashed and torn to bits. Jack tried to run but he was quickly grabbed by Dark Lady who squeezed him as hard as she could before passing him to Beryl.

"You should not piss me off, mortal. Now, you shall pay for your deed in blood." Beryl shouted, making Jack's ears ring.

"Where have I heard that before..." he asked himself, knowing someone had threatened him like that before.

"They're gonna kill him!" Serena shouted.

"Good." said Rei smugly, as she was still pissed.

"REI! How could you say that?" asked Amy.

"This whole mess is his fault, he gave Beryl the formula and everything. If he dies, he gets what he deserves... he's just lucky I didn't get to him first." said Rei.

The girls were shocked at first hearing this, then remembering what Beryl said earlier, and Jack's response. The girls decide...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Paying for the deed in blood.

1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Rei winced as she saw Dark Lady squeezing Jack between her hands. As much as she hated to admit it, not even Jack deserved what was about to happen to him.
"I'm gonna regret this," Rei thought as she concentrated her flame attack on Dark Lady. The attack knocked down the evil clone, sending Jack spiraling to the ground, landing on his left leg.
"YOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWW! Damn! That hurts! Last time I do a good deed."
Before he could get up and leave however, Jack found himself surrounded by the police on all sides, pointing their guns right at him.
"Hands up, buddy! What are you doing in the middle of here interrupting the fight?"
Jack sighed. "I can explain everything, officer."
"Oh yeah?" responded one of the other men. "Can you respond to the eyewitness that said you were at the shooting?"
"I don't know what you're talking about!"
"You're under arrest. Come with us."
Jack contemplated running, but with his leg broken and ribs even more banged up thanks to Beryl, it wasn't exactly a smart idea.

Thanks to Rei taking the Negaverse villians by suprise, the battle was slowly starting to turn in the senshi's favor. Already Beryl and her henchwomen were beggining to shrink due to the effects of the antidote, making it harder and harder for them to mount an effective offense.
"I think they're ready to give up!" shouted Lina as she fired another thunder attack at the Prisma and Emerald clones, knocking them down before they could charge. With both sides monsters evenly matched, it would only be a matter of time before Beryl and her forces were too small to fight.

Rei tried to keep her attention on the fight, but felt conflicted about Jack. One part of her wanted to rip him limb from limb. The other still felt sorry for him. Of course, she couldn't think about it too deeply when Dark Lady was charging her!
"I don't care if you're a million times bigger than me!" she screamed. "I'm still going to kill you!"
Rei struggled, but then noticed that the hands of Dark Lady were shrinking, unable to clasp around her neck. Smiling, she pushed her away and used her flame to drive Dark Lady back further.

"Ready to give up Beryl?" asked Serena confidently. She was confident that they had won. Beryl however...
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: A reserved sympathy

choices: The Senshi drive off the monsters.
The monsters are tougher than they look.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"I just have one thing to say to you, Sailor Senshi..." Beryl stated as she took a cool fighting pose.

"What's that?" asked Serena.

"RETREAT!!!" Beryl shouted as she turned tail and ran, leaving a trail of smoke behind her.

"Oh no you don't!" Lita shouted as she rushed forward and gave Beryl a mean left hook and sent her shrinking form sprawling into a building. Beryl fell to the ground, at normal size, dead. Her body was unscathed but you could tell by her unblinking, unmoving form that she was dead.

At this point, three incredibley geeky looking college kids with wierd red hair, pail skin, freckles, buck teeth, braces & retainers, pocket protectors, and who were really skinny, dragged Beryl's lifeless corpse into the back of their van and drove off. (don't sue me, I'm funny.)

"We did it! The battle's over!!" shouted Serena. As soon as Beryl died, the clones dissapeared into thin air.

"The battle isn't over Serena..." said Rei as she ducked out of the way of King Ghidorah, who had just been thrown by Godzilla.

"Let's just thank Jesus that Beryl and the others are out of the way." said Mina.

**************************************************

"Actually," began Jesus. "It wasn't me. It was-"

"No, there is no need, my friend." Said Buddah interrupting him. "It is ok. I am used to it."

**************************************************

"Well, let's go help Godzilla kick some ass." Lita began.

"Ok... we'll do this. THEN I get to kick Jack's ass." Rei said cracking her knuckles. The others just sighed.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Beryl's dead and Buddah's ignored.

choices: The battle's over.  The senshi won
Ghidra's still got some fight left in him
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
With Beryl and her cronies out of the way, the girls could now devote their full attention to the monsters Godzilla, Mothra, and Rodan were fighting. From their perspective, it seemed like they were evenly matched.
"Finally," smirked Rei, "I get to let some agression out." Waiting for a clear shot, she finally found a clear shot a Megalon.
"Celestial Fire Surround!"
With that, Sailor Mars fired a huge wave of flame at Megalon, burning him badly. Before Megalon could do anything, he was tackled head on by Rodan, knocking him into a building.
"One down," began Mina. "Two to go!" Turning to where Mothra was fighting Gigan, she began preparing her own attack.
"Venus Love Chain!"
With that, her trademark attack flew at Gigan, stunning him. That distraction allowed Mothra to swoop in and paralyze Gigan, causing him to fall out of the sky and crash.
"One to go!" shouted Lina. Turning her attention to King Ghidra, she saw the three headed beast evenly matched with Godzilla.
"Let's hit him with everything we've got!" continued Lita. Nodding, the girls all charged up their attacks and released them right at all three of Ghidra's heads. Seeing the opening, Godzila joined in with his radioactive breath. The combined force sent Ghidra reeling as Don King cheered Godzilla on.
"That's it!" cheered King. "Pour it on G-Man!"
Finally, the five girls finished their onslaught on Ghidra, leaving the monster ready to fall over.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: The senshi attack

choices: They answer some questions then move.
They forget the tabloids and go to look for their boyfriends
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"We did it!!" shouted Serena as she jumped in the air with joy.

"Yes!" they all shouted in unison.

"Now, we find our boyfriends." Mina said.

They didn't even get a chance. The press swarmed in and flooded the girls, the monsters, AND Don King with many many questions.

"Uh-oh G-man. We in trouble now." Don King said as he saw the press. "Just stay cool everyone." There was no answer. King turned around and saw Mothora flying away carrying Godzilla with the help of Rodan. Angilas, was held by Godzilla as they all flew away from the press.

"Oh yeah!! That's REAL NICE!!" King shouted after them. "JUST WAIT TILL I CATCH YOUR SCALY ASSES!!! YOU THINK YOU GONNA GET A BONUS FROM THIS?!! HELL NO!! BRING YOUR ASSES BACK HERE AND GET ME!!!" Don King shouted, jumping up and down being really pissed off.

"Does he know something we don't?" asked Mina.

"Sailor Whatever!" King shouted. "This is bad, you know who's in this crowd? Super Market Tabloid writers. We about to be swimming in a shit load of questions that make no sense and they will mis-construe what we say just like lawyers do to the legal system." King said.

"Teriffic..." Rei said sarcastically.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Super Market Tabloid Journalists

choices: The girls go off to look for their boyfriends.
The A-list reporters start to show up
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Serena was contemplating leaving the media circus until she saw something much worse than tabloid writers. Photographers. Tons of them.
"I don't think we can walk through the crowd."
"Because if we do," added Mina, "the odds are good our panties will end up on the cover of the tabloids."
Rei sighed. After beating Megalon down, she was finally starting to feel good again. The last thing she wanted to do was to answer a bunch of questions from some sleazy reporter.
The reporters began to swarm around Amy first, asking her tons of useless questions.
"Why are you wearing blue?"
"Exactly what is your relationship with the other senshi?"
"How did you get so big?"
"Were you involved in the mafia shootings earlier today?"
Amy sweatdropped. She didn't know where to begin. Finally, she cleared her voice and began answering the group.
"I like the color blue. We're good friends who decided to do something for the city. My growth is a result of a classified experiment. And no comment."
The other girls looked on as Amy efortlessly answered questions for the girls. Finally, the media circus decided to leave. Rei was stunned.
"How did you do that?"
"Simple. Speak quick and use small words. Even you wouldn't get confused Serena!"
Serena raised an eyebrow as the other girls laughed. Unfortunately, she couldn't think of a comeback.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Main attraction of the media circus

choices: The Scouts get their boyfriends to prove Walters wrong
The boyfriends show up with the news of Jack's arrest.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
They were about to leave when suddenly, the Comedy Central helicopter landed near them and tons of workmen rushed out with the sets of 2 shows. Late Night With Conan O'brian and The Daily Show With John Stewart! Then, out steps John Stewart himself.

"Hello, John Stewart here live from paradise. Hawaii? What are you talking about? No... not South America. Japan. Why Japan?" The camera zoomed out revealing the giant Sailor Scouts. "That's why Japan is paradise." The sound affects guy then cued the whistling cheering crowd noise.

"John Stewart, live from Japan where earlier today there was a mafia shoot out... ironically these mobsters were from America. What the hell were they doing here?" His eyes looked in the general direction of the Sailor Scouts. "Ah... that's what."

Conan O'Brian then stepped out of the chopper and stood in front of the Sailor Scout's feet to do his opening monologue.

"Authorities are unsure wether or not the growth of women is contagious, or wether it was bought on by an experiment." Conan began in his newscaster voice. "In a related story, Sandy Allen, who holds the Guiness world record for being the tallest woman on earth, has been quarantiend."

It didn't take long for other reporters to show up so the scouts split up. Rei and Serena would be with Conan O'Brian and John Stewart, while Mina Amy and Lita would be with Oprah, Regis Philmore and Barbara Walters.

"Sailor Mars," John began. "I'm assuming you get news from America every now and then, so tell me: What do YOU think of George Bush's presidency?"

"It's the biggest threat to world peace and security since the Nazis." Rei said firmly. The sound affects guy made crowd laughter come up.

"Couldn't have said it better myself. Ladies and gentlemen, Sailor Mars!" Serena was lounging with Conan O'brian in the meantime.

**************************************************

"Ok, to the few people out there who actually watch my horrible show, we have a very special guest tonight. Ladies and gentlemen please welcome, Sailor Moon. Give her a round of applause everybody." The cameras zoomed out revealing that Conan had his desk in the palm of Serena's hand. A BIG round of applause was followed.

"Hey, I don't remember MY round of applause being that big... what happened to my round of applause? Never mind, never mind. So, Sailor Moon... 115ft tall huh? You don't seem very tall at all?" The sound affect guy once again played the canned laughter. Serena smiled at Conan's bad comedy.

"Sailor Moon, put my desk out for a second, we're going to see just how much taller than me you are." Serena put Conan's desk down. Conan got up then walked up to Serena's foot. He stood on his tip-toes to try and seem tall. It wasn't working. "Hold on, Max, come here and give me a boost." Once again, more canned laughter.

"Sorry, Conan, you're on your own."

"You're a true friend Max..."

**************************************************

"Sailor Mercury... what's with the school girl outfit? Mini skirt? Come on now, you're super heroines not prostitutes." Oprah began. Amy, despite how offended she was, kept her cool.

"Being a super hero doesn't get you into the Fortune 500, Oprah, so we wear what comes cheap and school uniform type clothing is something we already had." Amy answered resisting the urge to do the world a favor and crush Oprah. Damn... and we were soooo close! Meanwhile, Regis was interviewing Mina.

**************************************************

"So, Sailor Venus, let's cut to the chase. First and foremost, the one thing I've always wanted to ask you, do you watch my show?"

"I would if we weren't so swamped with homework." Mina replied.

"Superheros have to pass school too I guess. So, anyway, hows it feel being so big? You could sit on a building like it was a chair. Wouldn't reccomend you try that though." he said, causing Mina to giggle.

"It doesn't feel any different really. Sure, it's harder to hear people but other than that no difference." Mina replied.

"Wow, I would have thought that you felt like Godzilla or something. But I guess you don't since everyone runs away from Godzilla while with you, everyone runs towards a view up your skirt." Regis said. Mina laughed again. Lita on the other hand, did not have a very courteous interviewer.

**************************************************

"Sailor Jupiter, let's be blunt. Is it true that you and Sailor Venus are a lesbian couple and that the Sailor Scouts are actually a lesbian activist group playing hero to gain acceptance from a sexist world?" asked Barbara Walters. Why is it that women named Barbara are bitches? Oh well, anyway.

"NO!! That is NOT true!!" Lita shouted.

"Denial, we've seen it before. Just come on and admit it."

"I have a boyfriend!!" Lita shouted.

"Sure you do, hun."
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: Big Shot Reporters.

choices: Rei deals with Barbra Walters and Oprah
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
Lita was quickly finding out the difference between bloodthirsty monsters and professional reporters. Reporters are a lot more determined.

"I am not a lesbian! I can prove it!" she shouted at Barbra Walters.
"Well, do it!"

Lucklily for Lita and Mina, the two saw the group of boyfriends running up to the senshi, with Darien screaming. More preoccupied with the current situation, Lita and Mina picked their boyfriends up and held him in front of Walters.

"See? This is my boyfriend!" proudly declared Lita as she huggled him to her cheek. "He's definetely cuter than Peter Jennings!"

"Young man, is this true?" responded Barbra Walters."

"Yeah, it's true. My name is **********, but people call me somedude."

"And the blonde's boyfriend is real too?"

"Yeah, dumbass," responded the boy in Mina's hands. Name's ********, but I go by the alias Freak Boy."

Barbra Walters shook her head in belief. "Oh, so you're not les, well, I feel stupid."

*************************************************

Meanwhile, Darien and Ben had ran up to Serena and Rei to tell them the news about Jack.

"Jack's been arrested?!"

"Yeah," began Darien. "He's been blamed for everything. The mob shootings, all of it. Didn't try to run either."

"I thought you'd want to know Rei," added Ben.

Rei stood still as Barbra Walters and Oprah got together.

"And you're supposed to be a superheroine?" commented Oprah. "Dating a criminal?"

"It figures," continued Walters. "Can you defend your henious taste in men?"

Rei looked at them both furiously, putting her head right in front of the comparitvely tiny reporters.

"You have no idea what you're talking about! Jack is innocent! He helped us!" The sheer power in her voice was enough to make Barbra Walters and Oprah shiver while everyone else looked on.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.title: One rumor false, the other true.  Oh, and self-ins

choices: Freak Boy and Somedude try to break Jack out.
The Giantesses try to break him out.
1112221111211122122111121222121111221212.content:
"Rei," Amy began. "I say we bail Jack's ass out of jail before he gets hurt by the people who really belong there."

"Fine..." Rei agreed.

"Oh, before we go..." Freak Boy started.

"What is it?" Mina asked, looking down at him as he stood in the palm of her hand.

"Oprah, Ms. Walter, for what it's worth... you're both the biggest bitches I've ever seen. You guys suck."

"That wasn't really nessecary Freak Boy."

"Yes it was. No one insults my girlfriend."

"Well... I guess that's sweet."

1121.content:
Rei went about her day at the temple as she normally did. Meditating or sweeping since her grandfather had neglected to do so this morning. Sometimes it really bothered her how forgetful that old man could be. Oh well, at least he wasn't out chasing women... or at least she hoped not.

She was currently dressed in her shrine maiden attire as she finished sweeping the floors out in the hot sun. She may command fire, but the sun was just something that couldn't be tamed. She was frying like an egg out there. Why did the A.C have to break down?

"Seriously, when grandfather gets back I'm going to demand we get a new air conditioner." Rei grumbled. Before she could dwell on her thoughts any longer, the sound of bells caught her ear. Someone was at the front gate. She immediately ceased her sweeping before making her way to the front of the shrine.

Anger soon filled her as she saw there was no one present. Where those delinquents from the neighborhood ding dong ditching again? Rei huffed. Those guys would never grow up. Just as she was about to turn and leave something out of place drew her attention. A little brown box.

"A package!" she questioned. The shrine wasn't expecting mail today. Just as she was about to pick it up another thought crossed her mind. What if this was some kind of trick? No doubt those delinquents dropped it off for her to find. They were all probably hiding in the bushes hoping she'd open it.

Her eyes narrowed as she walked over to a nearby shrub and forced it apart. Nobody to be found. Perhaps she was just being paranoid. With no threats in sight, Rei picked up the package. There were no stamps or labels, just a small white note tied to the top with her name on it.

Strange, but never the less she brought the package inside. Rei sat the box on her bed and began to tear away the brown paper. Underneath was a small white box with a flip open lid. Rei now found her curiosity at an all time high. What was in there and who sent it to her. Under normal circumstances she would never even consider opening such a package. But she'd already gone this far and may as well see this through.

Taking a deep breath, Rei flipped open the box to reveal something that left her feeling puzzled. Really? This was it? A gun? A toy gun at that. "That's it?"

A toy, all that curiosity over a toy. A very fancy toy she had to admit but a toy none the less. Her first instinct was to throw it out as she didn't play with toys, but something about this one in particular made her want to take a look. It was a small and silver device with a few dials and buttons with two massive letters on the side... G and S.

Not fully understanding, Rei aimed the gun at a her trash bin and fired. Much to her shock a small white beam fired from the barrel and struck the target. Her eyes widened as she watched the bin expand in size. This couldn't be real. Her hand immediately eased off the trigger as she stared down the gun in shock.

"Just who in the world sent me this?"

They went to the stadium as quietly as they could. Naturally, this wasn't all that quiet, but with the loud cheering inside the closed dome of the stadium they weren't heard by anyone inside.

Lita winked as she wrapped her legs around the bottom of the stadium, sealing every exit. Once she was sure every exit was blocked by her legs she pried the dome open. The stands were indeed packed, though not for long as the people inside panicked and tried to flee to the exits.

Rini and Lita dug in with gusto. Once the stands were devoid of people, they pried them away to get to everyone inside who had been denied escape by Lita's legs. After a few minutes, not a single person was left in the stadium.

"Whew!" Rini laughed as she held her stomach. "I'm sure full now!" Then she let out a burp which broke more than a few windows. "Oops... excuse me."

Lita just grinned. Though the stadium had been filling, she had let Rini enjoy as much as she wanted. That combined with Lita's larger stomach, even when they were normal size, ensured that Lita was far from full. Yet, perhaps she could take a break from snacking for now since Rini was no longer hungry.
1131121111.title: gorge at the stadium

choices: Half the vial. Leave the rest for Mina
All of it and date Bill by herself
1132.content:
Bill Mason,an exchange student from somewhere in central Texas,was working by himself after school. He didn't have any friends and was often alone. Lita,a secret admirer,always wanted to be close to him,one way or another. She hid in the doorway of the classroom as he makes a magical potion.

"Now to recite the words...Claptu,Verata,Nectos!" he shouted,which made the vial of liquid turn from clear to blue. She smiled and knew he'd do it if he set his mind to it.

"Someone there?" he asked,looking over at the doorway.
"I guess ya found me." she admitted.
"What you doing here?" he asked her.
"Nothing. Whats that you got there?" she looked on in wonder.
"I'm not so sure. I didn't get every tiny syllable on the money,but if I'm correct it should make a growth serum." he said.
"Why would you need a growth serum?" she asked, wondering where he learned Summerian spells.
"You don't even wanna know how much money a dirt poor guy like me will save on burritos and beer." he said,which made her laugh.

"Bill,can I have some?" she asked sweetly.
"Um...sure." he said,a bit shy. He handed her the vial. Because he had the spell wrong,it will only make women and all their possesions and clothes except their shoes grow. How much did she drink?
1132.title: Magic time! A love story?

11322.content:
Lita took a swig from the vial. At first, nothing happened, but then she quickly started growing to 50 feet tall. "Wow this is great! My clothes are even growing! Ow!" she cried as she noticed her shoes had not grown, pinching her feet tightly before breaking into pieces. "Why did that happen?"

"Interesting, their material must be somehow different," Bill said. "I need to study this."

Lita smiled sweetly at him. "Study later! Right now, lets go have a night on the town."

Bill looked up at her. "I...I would love to!" They left the building together (through the wall, mainly, since Lita couldn't fit through any doorways), but as they got outside, the people in the schoolyard panicked seeing Lita so big, which had Bill a bit worried. "Are you sure this is a good idea right now? I mean.. at the size you are now... well.."

"You're right, Bill. The police or army will probably want to capture me thinking I am a threat."

Bill nodded. "Well, let me prepare a..." he stopped mid-sentence when he noticed Lita drinking the rest of the serum.

"There," Lita said as she grew larger, "Now I can't be captured."

Bill's eyes widened. That was not what he had meant at all! He could only watch as Lita skyrocketed to...

115211.title: character

choices: Summon Luna-P and shoot yourself again. Its time for Mega-usa
Shoot Usagi and have her join in your giant fantasy
1152111.content:
You are having the same dream again. As usual everyone is tiny and you are larger than most buildings around you. Looking at your reflection in a skyscrapper causes you to smile uncontrollably. You stare at your pink hair and bright red eyes amazed that you are so huge. You can see the fog on the glass your breath is causing. You lean in and kiss your reflection and see your lips leave a huge mark on the glass. Some people are standing below you and you can tell where their eyes are fixed. "Hentai baka desu." you say with a mix of amusement and disgust. You casually stomp down and crush several people who refuse to move and feel a deep joy as they crunch under your mary-jane. Without any warning you lean into your hips and fall onto your bottom.
The ground shakes violently as you impact the street. You giggle and feel a tingle run through you as the tiny forms under your butt stop moving. In a flash you are back in your mom's bed and realize you are no longer dreaming. "I love having that dream." You say to no one and rub your eyes. Your teenage mother is still sleeping deeply and you crawl out of bed. You walk over to a mirror and look at yourself. You normally keep your bright pink hair in bunny-ear shaped pig-tails but having had just woken your hair is unkempt and hanging unbound. You admire your petite figure for a moment and then stick your tongue out at your reflection. The silly face you make causes you to snicker and your mind wanders back to the dream you keep having. "I bet it would be really cool to be super big like that." You say to your reflection and notice your Luna-p ball. You put your finger to your chin and think. "Luna P become a...size changing gun!" You decide in the moment and feel a ping of excitement as the ball becomes a plastic gun shape. "No way no way no way!" You try to keep quiet as excitement fills you. You hold the gun gently and see two options, one shows something large becoming smaller, and the other is the opposite. You toggle the option to the enlarge and point the gun at yourself.
As you fire the sound causes your mother to wake up. "Chiba-usa what is going on?" Usagi askes and opens her eyes to see you glowing in a bright colorful light. "Am I dreaming?" Usagi askes and rubs her eyes while she watches you expand. You were only wearing a light blue night-gown over your frilly white panties and feel the gown press against your torso. You can see everything getting lower to the ground and are amazed at how quickly you appear to be growing. "I don't think your dreaming. hehehe" You giggle and watch yourself grow in the mirror. "What did you do Chiba-usa?" Your mother asks as you continue to fill out the space around you. "Oh, I just wished Luna-P become a size changer and it did. Then I shot myself so I can become ultra big, like in the dream I keep having." You say very cheerfully despite the look of horror on your mother's face.
"Oh god your not kidding." Usagi said as she fearfully watched you continue to grow. "I hope I get so big I can sit on skyscappers and crush anything I feel like!" You say joyfully as you see the top of your mother's head below you, and feel the ceiling against your own. "You can't just grow like that everyone is going to think your a monster!" Usagi tried to argue. You sense a bubbly tingle under your skin and love how it feels. "I don't care if they think I am a monster, cause I think they are all gonna be bugs from my point of view and why should I care about what bugs think?" You say in a very cheerful tone as your head bumps the ceiling you can feel your body breaking through the second floor and let out a joyful squeel as you fall into the living room under your mother's room. You continue growing all over and soon your head is rising into the second floor and you can see your mother's body is getting smaller than your head. You smile and laugh as you see how panicked your blonde haired teenaged mother looked. You spent so much time being pushed around because she was double your size and now she was smaller than a child to you. You feel your head hit the ceiling and as you go through the roof you grab onto Usagi despite her resistance.
A massive boom of cracking lumber and breaking tile are combined with the echoing laughter of a childish voice that seemed too loud to be natural. "Bigger bigger!" You chant as you hold your shrinking mother in one hand. You are standing in only your panties and don't care that anyone can see your bare chest. You are very proud of your body and know from experience that you will become larger and more shapely than your mother when you finally are an adult. As a young girl you are very amused by how tiny everything has become and the cityscape looks like a toy-land to you. As you feel your mother continue to be more doll-like you cup your hands so you can hold her safely. If you dropped her you might change the past and Sailor Pluto would have to intervene. You wonder why she hasn't done anything to stop your actions and hope she will allow you to keep growing and play out your giant fantasy. It is very early morning and practically no one is awake to see the growing child you have become. "This is so awesome, I'm becoming a super big super-hero!" You say to your tiny mother and she has a confused but less worried look on her face. The way you are gently holding her makes her feel calm and she keeps reassuring herself that you wouldn't hurt her. Hearing her say this to herself you look down into your hands and she looks up at your massive red eyes. "If it'd make your feel better I can set you down." You suggest and feel the tiny woman shake her head yes. You very carefully set her down and continue to grow higher and higher. It occurs to you that you know where the size gun is and are sure if you commanded it, it would grow to your size so you could use it again.

Rini just happened to find a genie.

"You heard correctly young mistress. I shall grant you 12 wishes if you do wish.

"Awesome. I already know my 1st wish"

"That's great to hear young mistress. Please speak your desire. I humbly live to serve you"

"I wish I was bigger than Serena"


"Your wish is my command. Height is soon in sight others may have some spite fix this little girls plight for her delight"


Suddenly Rini felt a little strange.
Moments later she began to grow taller and larger all over.
When it stopped Rini stood a 9 foot tall version of her normal self.

"Amazing I'm so tall now. Serena will never call me shirty again"

"I am glad my mistress is pleased but as I've grown fond of you I should warn you of something"

"Warnings are no fun and I'm a big girl now so it's not necessary."

"I must insist young mistress"

"I said I don't need it now I wish you'd go away and let me enjoy this"

"Very well then. Your 2nd wish is granted and all other wishes are void. I take my leave"

With that the genie vanished.

Rini would have to learn the hard way why they say be careful what you wish for.

Serena rushes over to Rini's room and almost faints when she sees the 9 ft mini-giantess standing in front of her. Serena backs up to the wall and asks "R-Rini?! 11521121331122212121212111.content:
Serena was hesitant to respond. But before she could
Rini felt strange again.
This time instead of a trance Rini could actually feel
herself grow and react.



The 15 foot growing girl had to get on her hands
and knees into a crawling position as she swelled larger.
Serena took advantage of Rini’s distraction to make
a break for it and flee.


Serena ran outside.
“Grrr I wish that stupid genie would come back”

Suddenly the genie returned.
“Hey you’re back!”


“Darn you didn’t fall for my trick”


“Trick? Never mind that now! You lied and
I wish you’d give me honest answers”


The genie grinned and sighed.
“Very well! First off we genies are tricksters and
you need be careful what you wish for.
2nd I tricked you into wasting 3 wishes because I
forsaw you insulting me!”


Meanwhile Rini stopped growing at just over 20 feet tall.
She’d ignored or forgot the genie comment between
the growing distraction and now she was stuck in the
room she was in.


“Wait what other wishes” asked Serena?


“Your 1st wish was about the pink haired one
and a foolish wish at that tho I get the sense that
she might enjoy it!


The 2nd wish was for my return.
The 3rd much to my displeasure is to answer your
questions honestly while I’m still here.
Unfortunately some vague wishes can even vex we
genies!”



Serena had mixed reactions.


“Okay then so explain the brats growth”


“I already told you that you wished for it but your
wish for honest answers compels me... very well!
Your wish was too vague.
For the one called Rini to be bigger and not be a
little brat.


Because you didn’t specify she will continue
to grow and grow and grow bigger and bigger without
end until she either ceases to exist or somehow undoes
the wish of her own free will tho should she get too
large we genie won’t be able to do it as she’ll be
beyond our powers.”



“Explain yourself further! What do you mean
she’ll keep getting bigger”



“Oyy I see your friends are right about you being
dense.
It’s simple!
There’s multiple aspects to her growth.
1st the growth spurts as you’ve noticed.
There’s a few triggers and differences.


1- random growth spurts. She will feel and be
able to react to these. They will happen at random
interavals of every 10 to 30 minutes and
be random bursts of enlargement that get bigger as
she gets bigger.


The intervals are to allow her body time to adjust.


2- the exceptions are growth triggers.
Even if they occur back to back or stacked with
the random spurts the triggers have an effect.


The triggered spurts are like a cross between
post hypnotic response and bodily reflex.
The triggered spurts can be equal to or less than
previous spurts.


Triggers are
1- Her hearing someone mention her size or
growth particularly with regards words or actions that
for lack of a better term emphasize biggness!
It only works if she actually hears others talk about it
though thus she can’t force her own growth.


2- Psychological plus physiological
If she perceives eminent danger, feels legitimately
threatened, fearful, overwhelmed etc
to a significant extent that will trigger 1 or more spurts.


3 - Reactive
Similar to number 2 as a survival instinct her growing
body will try to protect itself.
If it perceives harm, injury or a situation that
can be solved by growing to protect itself 1
or more spurts may trigger.



In the case of the triggered spurts Rini will
enter a brief short trance like state and not
have much of any chance to react during it.”



Serena looked puzzled.
“Uhh what”

Fortunately Amy/Ami
had arrived during the start of the explanation.


“I think I get it” said Amy/Ami


“Ah good I see your smartest friend is here!
I’ll let her explain.
Now then if you’ll excuse me I’m getting the heck
outta here since you’ve created a growing problem
and she’s not going to stay stuck in your room
forever”


With that the genie held his lamp, turned into
smoke, went inside then the lamp flew off
like a shooting star.

1152112133212.content:
The next morning Rini wakes up feeling something is off.
She couldn't place what tho.

She goes about her morning routine.
Suddenly Rini noticed what was off.


Somehow she'd grown in her sleep. Spotting her measurements on her bedroom door she went over and checked it.
She was now 5 inches taller than normal.


"Wow I really grew? I wonder how? I hope I grow more I'm tired of being called shorty, little, runt and short stuff and treated like a little kid by Serena and others! It's weird tho that my PJ's grew with me"


She soon got changed into her usual outfit however with some difficulty.

"Huh my school outfit is tighter? I guess what I'm wearing grows with me?"

Next Rini went to look around the house.
It was the weekend and apparently everyone had gone out.
There was a note along with pancakes in the dining room.


Rini grabbed some pancakes and spotted a syrup dish similar to one from a restaurant.
The syrup was a slightly different color than she was used to but Rini shrugged it off.


Meanwhile the scientist and assistant were spying on her.

"Professor did you do what I think you did" asked the assistance.


"Maybe. Thanks to your incessant concerns last night I made a batch of ever grow serum as concentrated as possible. 555x normal strength and concentration and she's about to ingest it and become temporarily addicted"


"But sir aside from the dangers and risks 555x concentration would barely be liquid anymore"


Sure enough the assistant was right.
Rini struggled to get the "syrup" out.
It was like rubber cement.


"Wow this syrup is extra thick"
Finally she had drenched her pancakes in a good bit of the serum unaware what she was about to eat.


Rini took a few bites shocked at how amazing it tasted. She then ate about 3/4 of her 1st serving. Suddenly she felt strange.
The serum was so strong especially in these doses it forced a sudden spurt.


Rini shot up 6 inches in height.
She was now nearly 1 foot taller than normal.
Oddly her tight school outfit grew with her and didn't get any tighter.

"Huh did I just grow? Whoa this is crazy and amazing! I can't wait to measure myself after I finish this yummy breakfast"


"Wow what just happened professor? Shouldn't the spurts be slower and different"


"It's just a recoil effect likely from so much exposure to so much concentrated serum. Think of it as overflow. You fill up a container too much and it overflows. In this case a brief growth energy buildup between doses or spurts forces an instant spurt. She may have 1 or 2 more over the course of her meal"


Rini sure enough ate the last of the pancakes on her plate then for some reason she couldn't understand was compelled to lick the plate clean of "syrup" then drink and lick up every last drop from the syrup container.


No sooner than Rini had licked the last drop had the strange feeling returned. In an instant she shot up 13 inches this time.


Rini was now 2 feet taller than normal and slightly taller than Serena.


"Whoa it happened again! This is incredible! I just wish it happened slower so I could enjoy it"


Little did Rini realize from here on out the growth or at least any she was awake for would feel different and happen in significantly slower spurts.

115212.content:
Rini sat in Serena's room disappointed. Even though she had the powers of a sailor scout, the other girls advised her to sit out of their latest mission.

But one certainly cannot blame them for the decision. The girls had learned recently that Mimete had escaped from her electronic prison in the Convention Center, and was running freely in the city. They were taking this fight very cautiously, since they had learned that Mimete now had the power to change her size at will.

"(sigh) It's just not fair. I'm Sailor Chibi-Moon! How could they just leave me behind like this!?" Rini shouted.

Suddenly, an idea came into her head. If she were a little bigger, she could be able to fight alongside the other scouts. So she grabbed her Luna Ball and started bouncing it around the room before throwing it into the air.

"Kitty magic! Make me bigger!" Rini shouted. In an instant, the Luna Ball vanished. Nothing happened for a couple of minutes, but all of a sudden, Rini looked up at the ceiling to see it closing in on her. She quickly determined that her growing spell was working.

Luckily for Rini, her clothes were growing with her. So she could just watch as she increased in size. After growing through the roof, Rini had finally stopped growing... at 100 feet tall!

"Whoa... this is great. No wonder Amy fantasizes about being big most of the time!" Rini said. She then set her sights out into the city. She could either help the scouts and find (or even battle) Mimete, or get revenge on the other girls and make them pay for leaving her behind, especially Serena!

As Rini transformed into Sailor Chibi-Moon, she pondered her decision.
115212.title: Tired of being short

1152122.content:
Rini made her way within the city, admiring how much smaller all the buildings and people had gotten as a result of being 100 feet tall. Luckily for her, Mimete was nowhere to be seen, so she could have her fun without being interrupted.

Eventually, she turned a corner to see all five of the sailor scouts together and searching through the many different corridors of the city. Rini couldn't wait any longer, so she came out of hiding and started stomping her way towards them.

The girls turned around and nearly had a heart attack at what they were seeing. They had to back up to avoid nearly being crushed underneath Rini's massive pink boots.
"Rini!?" all of them said.
"Hey, girls. So what do you think of me now?" Rini said.
"Rini, you can't stay here. People will panic!" Mercury said.
"Why should I go back? All of you have shunned me before because I wasn't big enough. Why can't I still help you!?" Rini said.
"Well, Rini, we didn't literally mean you had to be bigger to help us..." Jupiter said.
"Yeah. And besides, we wouldn't want the Negaverse to capture you at that size. Who knows what they might try!" Venus said. Rini had finally had it. She wasn't going to be pushed around by girls older than her, not even if one of them was to be her mother in the future.

"Hmrph... fine. Perhaps I should really show you what I am capable of at this height!" Rini said. She could decide later on the fates of the girls. Right now, it came down to whether or not she should finish them one at a time or as a group.
1152122.title: Seeking more than desired

11521221.content:
Rini finally decided to have all the girls see her power at the same time.
"Just watch what I can do, girls!" Rini said. She then lifted her foot high into the air and started to slowly descend it on top of the girls. Serena was panicking wildly, as usual, over the situation.
"WWWWAAAAHHHHHH!!!!! We're gonna get squashed!!!" Serena shouted.
"Rini! Don't do this! Not after we've protected you after all this time!" Raye shouted. Just then, Rini stopped lowering her foot just inches from the girls.

She thought for a moment about what Raye said, and she was right. The sailor scouts had kept her alive for the most part from past evil encounters. Plus, Rini thought that if she crushed the sailor scouts here in the past, she would never be able to return to the future!

But Rini couldn't just let the sailor scouts go. She was just anxious to do something to them with her new size. On the other hand, she could just let them go and show the rest of the city her new size...

choices: The Four Sisters (from Sailor Moon R)
12.content: Here are all the major villianesses that I can think of from the Sailor Moon series.
12.title: A huge evil looms...

122.content:
Wiseman floated in the middle of the chamber as Rubeus looked at him. They had both been discussing how they could ever defeat the sailor scouts.

"Rubeus! My patience is wearing thin! We must put those wretched sailor scouts out of business, as well as their kid brat, too! We cannot conquer the future as long as they live!!!" Wiseman shouted.
"Forgive me, master. My sisters and I have tried everything that we have ever thought of, but they have just proven too strong for us!" Rubeus said.
"Yes, that is true. But we cannot keep failing like this. We need to start playing rough now! And I have just the thing that can help." Wiseman said. Just then, a strange black crystal floated onto Rubeus's hands.

"Huh? What's this?" Rubeus said.
"This is one of our most potent weapons, the Dragon Crystal. It contains the very essence of Emerald's power." Wiseman said.
"Emerald? Then that must mean..." Rubeus said.
"Yes, Rubeus. I'll leave you to figure it out for yourself. I'll just say that the sisters can have a big time in the old town tonight! Hahahahahaha!!!" Wiseman shouted.

He then faded away, leaving Rubeus all to himself. Rubeus began to think of the awesome abilities of the Dragon Crystal, as well as an old adage.

The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
122.title: The Dark Moon's last effort

1221.content:
Rubeus called back Catsy, Birdie, Avery, and Prisma back to the chamber, so that they can hear of the master plan. Some of the sisters weren't too thrilled about coming back after each of them had been doing some major shopping.

"Awwww... Rubeus! Did you have to call us back? I was in the middle of buying a year's supply of makeup!" Catsy said.
"Yeah, and they had this super cool sale on swimsuits as well. Something to help perk up my already beautiful figure." Birdie said.
"But on the other hand, at least we got away in a dirty fashion. Prisma forgot her wallet again." Avery said. Prisma grinned her teeth in frustration.
"Grrrrrr... at least I didn't supply the bad luck this time! Don't you know how popular those clothes were!?" Prisma said.

"(sigh) Ladies, they'll be plenty of time to do your shopping AFTER we capture the brat and do away with those sailor scouts!" Rubeus said.
"Why should we even bother? Those scouts have beaten us before, even after we gave it our best shot!" Prisma said.
"But this time, Wiseman and I have developed a plan that's foolproof!" Rubeus said.
"Yeah, yeah. Probably as foolproof as the store manager setting up that major sale on the makeup!" Catsy said.
"Take a look for yourself, ladies!" Rubeus said. He then flashed the Dragon Crystal out, and naturally, all the girls were quite fascinated. Some of them even gasped.

"No way! That's the legendary Dragon Crystal!" Birdie said.
"That thing's more powerful than all five of us combined." Avery said.
"We wouldn't be able to control such power very easily!" Catsy said.
"Hmmmm... so what's up with Emerald's little gizmo, Rubeus?" Prisma said.
"If we're going to succeed in our plan and conquer the future, we need to start thinking big. And this Dragon Crystal is just the thing we need." Rubeus said.
"You mean we can actually become giants, much like what Emerald does with her energy statues?" Catsy said.
"Precisely." Rubeus said.

"Excellent... there's nothing better than borrowing Emerald's power and going out and acting like Godzilla!" Prisma said.
"Actually, Prisma, you're already a Godzilla when it comes to shopping! Perhaps that power should be given to someone more capable, like me." Avery said.
"What!? Are you kidding, Avery? With my sharp claws, I could slice and dice the city into mincemeat while searching for that little brat!" Catsy said.
"Oh come now, you don't need any fancy claws to find that little brat. Someone as bright, intelligent, and cool as myself would find those sailor scouts easily!" Birdie said. Eventually all the girls started to squabble over who should take advantage of the Dragon Crystal's powers. Fortunately, Rubeus stepped in to intervene.

"Right now this crystal is strong enough to supersize only one of you. I'm hoping the Wiseman is working on a backup source. But in the meantime, who would like to take the risk and crush those puny sailor scouts once and for all!?" Rubeus said.
1221.title: The master plan

12211.content: Which one will Rubeus select?
12211.title: Catsy or Birdie

choices: Lure the girls into a trap
122112.content:
After much bickering between all the sisters, Birdie finally stepped closer towards Rubeus.
"I'll assume the powers of the Dragon Crystal, if you don't mind, Rubeus. There's no way those sailor scouts could stand up to me and my ice powers." Birdie said.
"For your sake, I hope you're right." Rubeus said, before he threw the crystal right at Birdie. She was able to catch it in her hands.
"Don't come back until the blood and guts of those girls are all over your boots!" Rubeus said.
"Very well, Rubeus." Birdie bowed before she jumped through the mirror.

Birdie then appeared on top of a building within the city. She looked down at her surroundings before looking at her crystal once again.
"Hmmm... let's see. Should I go ahead and use this thing to grow, or should I lure the girls into a trap? I could always try and capture Rini to force the girls to come and watch me grow..." Birdie began to think of what she could do.
